T02D2624:156a-32: gyis brlabs pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir na 'og gi

T02D2624:156a-37: rtags su gser gyi shing yal ga dang ldan pa

T02D2624:156b-3: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa'i nad

T02D2624:156b-5: rtags sman dang / so sor kun du [*kun tu?] rtogs pa'i shes rab la /

T02D2624:156b-19: dag pa phyung nas 'gro ba la chos ston pa'i
T02D2624:156b-20: rtags su rnga bo che dang /

T02D2624:156b-33: sa dang por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pas na /

T02D2624:156b-35: de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang
T02D2624:156b-36: chub sems dpa' thams cad shes pa'i rtsal sbyong ba

T02D2624:157a-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2624:157a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2624:157a-4: gzhal yas khang de ni sa dang po mthong ba'i
T02D2624:157a-5: lam yan chad ma yin ba gzhan gyis ma rtogs
T02D2624:157a-6: pas na / shes pa'i rtsal sbyangs te ;
T02D2624:157a-7: thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas de na rnam pa
T02D2624:157a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa 'khor
T02D2624:157a-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs pas yongs su
T02D2624:157a-10: bskor nas sprin bzhin du gtibs te bzhugs pa'i don
T02D2624:157a-11: rab tu bsdus pa ston te /
T02D2624:157a-12: gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i don bsdus pa'i don bshad zin to /
T02D2624:157a-14: // / da ni 'jig rten pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
T02D2624:157a-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor mi smos par /
T02D2624:157a-16: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor sna la smos pa mi 'gal lam zhes rgol ba las /
T02D2624:157a-17: gtan tshigs kyis mi 'gal bar ston te /
T02D2624:157a-19: 'jig rten pa'i chos can 'jig rten pa las 'das par chos nyid du bzla ba dang /
T02D2624:157a-20: theg pa chung ba'i 'jig rten pa rnams mos pa skyed du gzhug pa'i phyir na smos so //

T02D2624:157a-22: nor bu tir ya ka brgya byin pas brgya byin te /
T02D2624:157a-24: gnas kyi bdag po yin pas sna la smos so //
T02D2624:157a-25: tshangs pa ni nyon mongs ba 'khor 'gyod khrin dang 'dra ba las tshangs pa'am /
T02D2624:157a-27: chos kyi 'khor lo chen bo rnams la bskul bar dam bcas bas na smos so //
T02D2624:157a-28: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2624:157a-29: de gnyis kyi 'khor du ni 'dod khams brgya byin gyi 'khor du sdud pa dang /
T02D2624:157a-30: gzugs khams tshangs pa'i 'khor du sdud pas na 'khor dang bcas pa ni sogs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2624:157a-31: so so'i skye bo las bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D2624:157a-32: tshogs rnams tshul bzhin bsags nas sbyor ba'i lam non /
T02D2624:157a-33: de theg pa chen po'i 'khor bar mi ldog cing /
T02D2624:157a-34: sngon chad ma mthong ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rigs gzung ba dang /
T02D2624:157a-35: rnam pa gcig tu cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi dang
T02D2624:157b-0: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i sgo @157b
T02D2624:157b-2: theg pa chen po'i rigs 'dzin pas na rigs 'dzin no //
T02D2624:157b-3: de'i 'og tu de rnams kyi bsod nams kyi rkyen
T02D2624:157b-4: chags pa'i yul de chos nyid ye shes kyis brgyan
T02D2624:157b-5: pas na lha'i bu smos so //

T02D2624:157b-7: rnam thos sras dang srungs yang dag shes la sogs pa'o //
T02D2624:157b-8: de'i 'og tu zhe sdang gi dregs pa yongs su gzhug pa'i phyir na /
T02D2624:157b-9: srin po'i sde lang ka mgrin bcu dang /
T02D2624:157b-11: de'i 'og tu phrag dog gdug rtsub tu gzhug pa'i phyir na /

T02D2624:157b-15: sum brtsegs 'khor dang bcas pa dang /

T02D2624:157b-19: de'i 'og tu spyod pa mi tshad pa tshad du bcug pa'i phyir na /

T02D2624:157b-22: de'i 'og tu skal ba med pa rnams gzengs bstod
T02D2624:157b-23: du gzhug pa'i phyir na lto 'phye chen po rab

T02D2624:157b-26: klu'i sde ba ru na dang 'jog po la sogs pa'o //

T02D2624:157b-29: ston pa'i zhabs 'bri nag dregs pa can yin pas

T02D2624:157b-35: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na /

T02D2624:157b-39: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smos te

T02D2624:158a-1: nas bcom pas na byang ngo //
T02D2624:158a-2: dngos po med pa'i mtha' spangs te /
T02D2624:158a-3: shes bya la ye shes khyab pas na chub po //
T02D2624:158a-4: chos nyid don gnyis su med par sems pas na sems so //
T02D2624:158a-5: de'i don gnyis su med pas na /
T02D2624:158a-6: skad cig kyang mi yengs par klong du gyur pas
T02D2624:158a-7: na bdud dang mu stegs kyis bslur mi thub pas

T02D2624:158a-9: ngang las sngon gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis dag

T02D2624:158a-11: sgrib pa spangs pa 'byung ste gnas pa ni sems

T02D2624:158a-13: rje de 'khor ba mi zad kyi bar du sran

T02D2624:158a-18: ting nge 'dzin de tsam la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir dang /

T02D2624:158a-22: 'bri nag 'khor du bsdus pa'i phyir na grangs kyi

T02D2624:158a-25: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshad med pa ni /

T02D2624:158a-27: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi blo gros la thabs
T02D2624:158a-28: mkhas pa'i spyin pa tshad med dpag tu med pa'i
T02D2624:158a-31: nam mkha'i blo gros kyi don la snying po ni tshad med pa smos so //
T02D2624:158a-32: blo gros mi g-yo ba zhes pa ni /

T02D2624:158a-34: tshul yang dag pa'i ngo bo yangs la rgya che bas mi g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:158a-35: khrims de las mi 'da' bas blo gros so //

T02D2624:158a-38: snying po ni skyon spangs pa'i don te blo gros dang spyar ro //
T02D2624:158a-39: de lta bu'i sa'i snying po'i rang bzhin pas na smos so //
T02D2624:158a-41: bzod chen brtan pas ri rab lhun po 'dra /
T02D2624:158b-0: yang dag pa'i bzod pa yangs la rgya che @158b ste ;
T02D2624:158b-1: ri rab ltar bskyod par dka' ste sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2624:158b-2: sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis ba stan pa yang /

T02D2624:158b-5: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis kun du [*kun tu?]
T02D2624:158b-6: myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kun du [*kun
T02D2624:158b-7: tu?] 'gro 'ong brtson 'grus thogs pa med pas blo
T02D2624:158b-8: gros so // de ni phyag na rdo rje ste /

T02D2624:158b-10: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas blo gros so //
T02D2624:158b-11: blo gros mtha' yas ni bsam pa mi 'gyur nam mkha'i dkyil dang 'dra /
T02D2624:158b-12: chos kyi don la yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis gtan pa bcug pas na blo gros so //
T02D2624:158b-13: sku gsung thugs nam mkha' ltar yangs pas na mtha' yas so //
T02D2624:158b-14: de ni dri ma med par grags pa ste /
T02D2624:158b-15: yang dag pa'i shes rab la skyon gyi dri ma med pas na blo gros so //
T02D2624:158b-16: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rje sna tshogs kun du [*kun tu?] grags pa mtha' yas zhes smos so //
T02D2624:158b-17: blo gros ka ma la ni /
T02D2624:158b-18: shes rab mtha' gnyis spangs pas padma 'dra ste /
T02D2624:158b-19: shes rab kyi gzung 'dzin yangs pa ste blo gros so //
T02D2624:158b-20: mtha' gnyis la sems pas padma ltar ma chags pas na ka ma la 'o //
T02D2624:158b-21: de ni 'jam dpal te sku gsung thugs 'jam pas na blo gros 'jam pa'o //
T02D2624:158b-22: shes rab tshad med pas nam mkha'i dkyil dang 'dra bas na dpal te ka ma la zhes pa'o //
T02D2624:158b-23: blo gros chen po ni thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad pas gar mkhan 'dra /
T02D2624:158b-24: thabs kyis 'gro don sna tshogs sum mdzad pas na blo gros so //
T02D2624:158b-25: mdzad pa gar thabs dang 'dra ba 'joms pas na chen po'o //
T02D2624:158b-26: de ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
T02D2624:158b-27: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi spyan gyis chos nyid kyi don la gzigs pas na blo gros so //
T02D2624:158b-28: thugs rjes 'khor ba la dbang zhing tshogs rdzogs nas phyug pas na chen po'o //
T02D2624:158b-30: stobs chen gnon bas lha rdzas mthu chen 'dra /
T02D2624:158b-31: ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i blo gros so //
T02D2624:158b-32: pha rol gyis zil gyis mi non pas na lha rdzas so //
T02D2624:159a-2: phyogs med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pas na blo gros so //
T02D2624:159a-3: skye ba gcig gis thogs pas na lha rdzas so //
T02D2624:159a-4: blo gros sna tshogs pas ni smon pa med pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan /
T02D2624:159a-5: chos nyid kyi don mthong ba ni smon pa med pas na blo gros so //
T02D2624:159a-6: yang dag pa'i ye shes sna tshogs su snang bas na sna tshogs so //
T02D2624:159a-7: de ni kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po ste /
T02D2624:159a-8: lta ba dang spyod pa kun du [*kun tu?] ngan pa'i ming yang med pas na blo gros so //
T02D2624:159a-9: smon lam sna tshogs la mnga' brnyes pas sna tshogs so //
T02D2624:159a-10: sogs zhes bya ba ni gong du gsungs pa'i don te /
T02D2624:159a-11: gtso bor rnams kyis 'khor du gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:159a-12: phyir mi ldog pa ni mos pa spyod pas ngan
T02D2624:159a-13: song du mi ldog pa brgyang pa mtshan mar mi
T02D2624:159a-14: ldog pas na phyir mi ldog pa'o //
T02D2624:159a-15: dge 'dun thug pa med pa ni 'khor gyi rnam
T02D2624:159a-16: grangs kyis chos nyan cing 'jug pas na smos so
T02D2624:159a-17: // de la dge ba'i 'bras bu bla na med pa'o ;
T02D2624:159a-18: /'dun pa yid 'phags pa'i lam la dmigs pa'o //
T02D2624:159a-19: 'khor mang po'i dbus na zhes bya'o //
T02D2624:159a-20: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' thugs las skyes ba'i 'khor dang /
T02D2624:159a-21: nyan thos dgra bcom pa gsungs las skyes pa'i 'khor dang /
T02D2624:159a-22: lha klu gnod spyin la sogs pa 'jig rten las kyi 'khor dang /
T02D2624:159a-23: snang srid thams cad thugs rje zhing gi 'khor gyi dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te /
T02D2624:159a-25: tshangs pa chen po padma'i gdan ni /
T02D2624:159a-26: ye shes kyi 'khor ba las tshangs pa dang 'phrin
T02D2624:159a-27: las kyis khams gsum thams cad 'khor ba las tshangs
T02D2624:159a-28: par byed pa'o // padma ni thugs rnam par dag pa mtshan mas mi gos pa dang /
T02D2624:159a-29: thabs mkhas pa'i phrin las 'gro ba'i don mdzad na spyod pas mi gos pas na spyad pa'o //
T02D2624:159a-30: chen po'i rgyu byang chub dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2624:159a-31: 'bras bu khams gsum thams cad bla na med pa'i don la dgongs pas na chen po'o zhe'o //
T02D2624:159a-32: gdan ni 'brel pa'i don te thugs rje thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don la zhugs pas gdan /
T02D2624:159a-33: ting nge 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngang la bzhag pas gdan no //
T02D2624:159a-34: bzhugs pa ni ting nge 'dzin ye shes ngan song sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang /
T02D2624:159b-0: phrin las @159b thugs rjes 'od zer sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2624:159b-1: da ni ston pas gleng bslang ba ston te /

T02D2624:159b-10: phrin las 'od zer sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyong ba'o //
T02D2624:159b-11: ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge

T02D2624:159b-15: ting nge 'dzin gyis ni 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi

T02D2624:160a-5: las 'byung ba'i mdzod spu ba stan la phyung ba

T02D2624:160a-29: mdzad pa legs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2624:160a-33: phyir ro // byang chub spyod pa nyid la gzhag pa ni /

T02D2624:160a-38: de la sems can gyi bsod nams kyi phung po

T02D2624:160b-0: @160b ba spu mngon par grub pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya 'gyur gyis ni /

T02D2624:160b-9: gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bye ba 'bum
T02D2624:160b-10: grub bo // tor grub po // gyis ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung grub bo //
T02D2624:160b-12: rgyu ni rkyen dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag
T02D2624:160b-13: la brten nas byang chub kyi phyogs dang pha rol
T02D2624:160b-14: tu phyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'o
T02D2624:160b-15: // tshad med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung khungs ni /
T02D2624:160b-16: tshad med pa'i ni rgyu tshad med pa dang /
T02D2624:160b-19: yon tan sna tshogs pa ste /

T02D2624:160b-24: tshad med pa'i thabs rdzogs pa ni thabs gnyis te /
T02D2624:160b-25: rgyu'i thabs rgyu chung du las 'bras bu mang por byed pa'o //
T02D2624:160b-26: 'bras bu'i thabs ni sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin 'byung bar bya zhing snang ba'o //
T02D2624:160b-27: shes rab tshad med par bsags pa ni dang por
T02D2624:160b-28: 'jig rten pa'i shes rab la brten cing bsgoms pas
T02D2624:160b-29: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab thob ste /
T02D2624:160b-30: de ni chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pas tshad med de /
T02D2624:160b-32: dngos po dang mtshan ma dang bral bas tshad kyi bye brag tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:160b-33: tshad med ba ni thun mong dang thun mong ma

T02D2624:160b-35: / thun mong ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa la /

T02D2624:160b-37: 'dul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du rung bar mdzad pa ni 'dul ba'o //
T02D2624:161a-3: skye ba ni las las skye zhing 'khor ba gzhol phyogs su bor ba'o //
T02D2624:161a-4: tshad med pa ni rgyu tshad med pa ni gnas khams gsum dang 'khor bar lus blangs nas /
T02D2624:161a-6: brgyang kyis gzir ba'i de'i rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pa'o //

T02D2624:161a-13: nyon mongs pa spong ba'i grogs mi mnyam pa dang /
T02D2624:161a-15: mnyam pa ni rtog pa dang bral zhing dngos po med pas na mnyam pa'o //
T02D2624:161a-16: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni /
T02D2624:161a-17: mi mnyam pa dang 'gro ba gzhan nyan thos dang

T02D2624:161a-29: ma byed cig go zhes pa ni the tshom yid
T02D2624:161a-30: mi ches pas rtog pa zhugs pa'o //
T02D2624:161a-31: so ma nyi ni bya mi bya snyam pa'i som nyis so //
T02D2624:161a-33: res 'ga' ni blo mi rgod pas ni yid gnyis so ;
T02D2624:161a-34: /'khor gyis gleng bas ngo mtshar gyi rgyu ba stan pa'o //

T02D2624:161a-37: 'dod khams kyi lha la dbang byed pas na dbang po'o //

T02D2624:161b-0: la rtsa la @161b sbyangs pas na brgya byin no
T02D2624:161b-1: // rdo aa mo li ga'i steng na rin po che'i khri'u la bzhugs pa'i phyir na rang gi'o //

T02D2624:161b-5: gus pa dang bskyed pa'i phyir langs pa'o //

T02D2624:161b-7: rta dang glang po che la sogs pa'o //
T02D2624:161b-8: rgya che ba ni sems kyis yid bzhin gyi sgrin
T02D2624:161b-9: tshogs 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi lha mor sprul pa'o
T02D2624:161b-10: // phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2624:161b-11: phyag ni lus kyis langs pa dang /

T02D2624:161b-15: gsol to ni 'og gi don zhus pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2624:161b-16: spobs pa bskyed par gsol te /

T02D2624:161b-18: rang gi mos pa'i mthus zhu bar spobs ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D2624:161b-19: bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs pa bskyed par gsol /

T02D2624:161b-21: gshegs pa ni thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pas gshegs pa'o //

T02D2624:161b-25: don zhu bar gsol ba rab tu gdab pa'i phyir
T02D2624:161b-26: ro // spyir zhu ba'i don bsdus nas bshad zin to /

T02D2624:161b-31: de dag kyang brgya byin gyi phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyang nas bzhi bzhi 'dug ste /
T02D2624:161b-32: brgya byin la bskor bas na blon po zhes bya'o //

T02D2624:161b-35: te / 'di ni lha'i gnas nyid la bya /

T02D2624:162a-0: @162a * // mtshams med pa ni las dang nyon mongs pa ste /
T02D2624:162a-1: rnam par dkar ba'i bar mtshams med pa'o //
T02D2624:162a-2: 'bras bu la bar mtshams med pa ni /
T02D2624:162a-3: sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa la /
T02D2624:162a-4: bde ba'i bar mtshams ni skad cig kyang med pa'o //
T02D2624:162a-5: sems ni sdug bsngal la gnas pa yin la /
T02D2624:162a-6: can ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar len pa'o //
T02D2624:162a-7: dmyal ba ni 'joms pas ni rab tu mnar ba'o //
T02D2624:162a-8: gzhan mdo sde'i gzhung las gsal bsam bris so //
T02D2624:162a-9: mtha' 'khob ni khrims med pa'i mthar phyin pa dang /
T02D2624:162a-10: chos skad mi thos pas mtha' 'khob bo //
T02D2624:162a-11: rnam pa gcig tu yul mtha' 'khob ni gang ri la mi mtha' 'khob ni spyod pa ngan pa'o //
T02D2624:162a-12: rnam par smin pa'i don bsdus pa bshad zin to /
T02D2624:162a-14: // / rnal par smin pa la skyo ba'i don ston te /
T02D2624:162a-15: de nas brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nas ;

T02D2624:162a-18: ston pas rnam par smin pa'i don gsungs pa la /

T02D2624:162a-21: rgyu nyon mongs pa la ni shin tu dngangs /
T02D2624:162a-22: 'bras bu sdug bsngal la rab tu skrag ste /
T02D2624:162a-23: 'dod pa'i yon tan la rab tu skyo na yid skrag pas khas bub tu 'gyel to zhe'o //
T02D2624:162a-24: da ni zhu ba bsnan pa ba stan to //

T02D2624:162a-27: bdag dang gzhan ngan song las rab tu thar par bya ba'i phyir zhus pa'o //

T02D2624:162a-29: de yang ci'i phyir ngang zhe na /

T02D2624:162a-34: gser thub la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgyang cu

T02D2624:162b-10: dad pas zhu ba'i tshul dang ;

T02D2624:166a-26: sa gzhi mnyam las phyogs shing sna tshogs skyes pa'o //
T02D2624:166a-27: mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs //

T02D2624:166a-29: phyogs su lha kang ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rten
T02D2624:166a-30: yod pa'o // kun dga' ba ni /
T02D2624:166a-31: mi mang po 'du ba'i sa phyogs su bri bar gsungs so //
T02D2624:166a-32: ci bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02D2624:166a-34: ci bzhin ni gnas ci bzhin pa dang /
T02D2624:166a-35: yo byad ci bzhin pa dang /

T02D2624:166a-42: mi snang ba'i sa'i lha mo la sogs pa la /

T02D2624:166b-14: bzhi'o // byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas der ni //

T02D2624:167a-0: @167a * // yang dag pa'i stobs tshad med pa'i rtags su glang po che ste /

T02D2624:167a-15: rdo rje rin chen padma dang /

T02D2624:167a-17: rdo rje ni rdo rjer ba zlum po ste /

T02D2624:167a-28: srad bu brgyang dang ldan pa la /

T02D2624:167a-30: srad bu ni thig skud de byang chub sems su bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:167a-31: brgyang ni phyogs thig bzhi dang /
T02D2624:167a-32: nang thig bzhi dang brgyang do //
T02D2624:167a-33: rnam pa brgyang dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2624:167a-34: sku la bkra shis kyi rtags brgyang rdzogs pa'i rtags so //
T02D2624:167a-37: ting nge 'dzin rtogs pas 'jug pa'i thabs so //
T02D2624:167a-39: sgo la sum rim ste sgo bcu gnyis kyis ba stan pa'o //

T02D2624:167a-42: snam bu la bzhi rim gyis brgyan pa ni /

T02D2624:167b-7: sgo dang sgo khyud du bya'o //

T02D2624:167b-12: rdo rje srad bus thig btab pa /

T02D2624:167b-14: rdo rje ni rigs la bya ste /

T02D2624:167b-38: chos kyi dbyings ni ye nas rnam par dag pa /
T02D2624:167b-39: mtshon pa'i rtags lte ba la /
T02D2624:167b-40: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rje phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags rtsibs te /
T02D2624:167b-41: chos ni dbyings la lte bar yang ba stan la /
T02D2624:168a-1: la rtsibs ni thugs rje'i rang bzhin du ba stan to //

T02D2624:168a-8: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / zhes pa ni /

T02D2624:168a-11: 'dod pa 'byung bas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2624:168a-13: thugs rje phun sum tshogs pas /

T02D2624:168a-33: sprul pa'i 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /

T02D2624:168a-42: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
T02D2624:168a-43: zhes pa ni rtsibs ni 'khor lo'i lte ba ste /
T02D2624:168a-44: de la nyis 'gyur du bya ba'i dbus kyi rin
T02D2624:168a-45: po che'i phreng ba tshun chad kyi rim pa ma

T02D2624:168b-14: don gsal bar ba stan pa'i phyir smos so //

T02D2624:168b-22: cad mnyam pa'i rang bzhin bas zhal bzhi smos te

T02D2624:168b-33: mdun du ngan song kun 'dren ni //

T02D2624:168b-37: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis 'joms shing 'dren

T02D2624:169b-1: ye shes kyi sku la chos nyid rgyan yum du ba stan pas sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02D2624:169b-2: m'a ma k'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po gzhan las byung zhing /
T02D2624:169b-3: che ba rin po che lta bu mi chad pa longs spyod par ratna m'a ma k'i'o //
T02D2624:169b-4: na bza' dkar mo'i ting nge 'dzin tshul khrims kyi
T02D2624:169b-5: na bza' dam pa dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2624:169b-6: nyes skyon gyi rnam pas mi tshugs pas na bza'
T02D2624:169b-7: dkar mo'o // dam tshig sgrol ma ni sngon gyi
T02D2624:169b-8: phrin las mnga' ba'i 'bras bus da ltar phrin las
T02D2624:169b-9: rgya mtsho lta bu la mnga' brnyes pas khams gsum
T02D2624:169b-10: gyi sems can rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes
T02D2624:169b-11: mi 'da' bar dam tshig gis bsgral bas dam tshig
T02D2624:169b-13: lo ts'a na ni zla ba tshes pa la spyan yod pa dang /
T02D2624:169b-14: m'a ma k'i la rin po che'i mchod sdong dang /
T02D2624:169b-15: na bza' dkar mo la padma sgrol ma'i autpala bri'o //
T02D2624:169b-16: mtshan gyis lha mo'i don ba stan zin to //
T02D2624:169b-17: sems dpa' bcu drug 'khor lo'i rtsibs la 'dug pa'i don te /
T02D2624:169b-19: rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du //
T02D2624:169b-20: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog / ces gsungs
T02D2624:169b-21: pa ni rtsibs ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug ba
T02D2624:169b-22: stan pa'o // nang ni 'khor lo'i lce la bris pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:169b-23: de la shar phyogs kyi rtsibs la bri ba'i sems
T02D2624:169b-24: dpa' bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis
T02D2624:169b-25: / kun gzhi gnas gyur pa'i thabs te /
T02D2624:169b-26: 'dul ba'i dbang du sku sprul te yang dag pa'i
T02D2624:169b-27: ye shes kyis chos nyid don la sems pas na
T02D2624:169b-29: nyon mongs pa'i bdud las rgyal bas rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D2624:169b-30: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la chags pas rdo rje chags pa'o //
T02D2624:169b-31: yang dag pa'i ye shes gzung 'dzin gyi skyon gyis ma gos pas rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02D2624:169b-32: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa dang /
T02D2624:169b-33: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis chos nyid kyi don la smes pas shar phyogs su bri'o //
T02D2624:169b-34: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2624:169b-35: yid nga dang bdag tu lta ba gdul ba'i phyir
T02D2624:169b-36: lho phyogs kyi sems dpa' ba stan te /
T02D2624:169b-37: yang dag pa'i ye shes la gzung 'dzin gyi skyon
T02D2624:169b-38: gyis ma gos pas che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs
T02D2624:170a-2: sku gsung thugs ye shes kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pas rdo rje gzi brjid do //
T02D2624:170a-3: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa'i bdud las rgyal bas na rdo rje rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2624:170a-4: sku gsung thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo las
T02D2624:170a-5: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la bzhad
T02D2624:170a-6: pas na rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02D2624:170a-7: so sor kun du [*kun tu?] rog pa'i ye shes
T02D2624:170a-8: yid kyi rnam par shes pas yul la rang thad
T02D2624:170a-9: du mchod pas 'khor lo'i rgyu yin pas gdul ba'i
T02D2624:170a-10: phyir ro // thugs rjes nub kyi sems dpar sprul te /
T02D2624:170a-11: bzhugs pa ni so sor kun du [*kun tu?] rtog pa'i ye shes kyi chos spyi dang /
T02D2624:170a-12: rang gi mtshan nyid la ma rmongs pas rdo rje chos rab bo //
T02D2624:170a-13: yang dag pa'i ye she skyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtsad nas gcong pas rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02D2624:170a-14: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes 'khor ba kha lo bsgyur bas rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02D2624:170a-15: gsung rnam par dag pas 'gro ba la chos ston pas rdo rje smra ba'o //
T02D2624:170a-16: sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pas yul la rang thad du gcod pas 'khor ba'i gyu ste /
T02D2624:170a-17: gdul bya'i thabs su byang phyogs kyi sems dpar sku sprul te /
T02D2624:170a-18: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2624:170a-19: pa'i phrin las sna tshogs su mdzad pas rdo rje
T02D2624:170a-20: las rab po // phyin ci log gi gzung 'dzin
T02D2624:170a-21: gyis mi tshugs pa'i go skabs pas rdo rje bsrung
T02D2624:170a-22: las rab po // ba'o // rdo rje lta bu'i
T02D2624:170a-23: ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'dul bas
T02D2624:170a-25: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi sa rtog pa thams
T02D2624:170a-26: cad kyi mtha' spangs pas rdo rje'i khu tshur ro
T02D2624:170a-27: // da ni phyi nang gi gru chang kyi lha mo'i don to //
T02D2624:170a-29: mkhas pas l'a s+ye la sogs pa'i //
T02D2624:170a-30: mchod pa grva yi phyogs su bri //
T02D2624:170a-32: khams gsum gyi lha chen po 'dod chags can gdul ba'i thabs su /
T02D2624:170a-33: nang gi lha mo bzhir ba stan te /
T02D2624:170a-34: ye shes mtshon pa'i yul du byung ste /
T02D2624:170a-35: khams gsum gyi sems can dang cha bstun pa'i phyir
T02D2624:170a-36: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis chos nyid don gsal
T02D2624:170a-37: bar rtogs pa'i rtags su l'a s+yer ba stan no
T02D2624:170a-38: // byang chub sems las 'dod pa sna tshogs 'byung bas m'a ler ba stan no //
T02D2624:170a-39: yang dag pa'i chos ston pa'i rtags su g'i tir ba stan no //
T02D2624:170b-0: thabs mkhas pa'i mdzad pa gar @170b thabs dang 'dra ba'i rtags su nri ti ba stan no //
T02D2624:170b-1: de ni ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i yul dbyings mtshon pa'i rtags 'dul ba'i dbang du ba stan no //
T02D2624:170b-2: de ni nang gi gru chad la smos so //
T02D2624:170b-3: de'i 'og tu phyi rol dang chos mthun pa'i dus
T02D2624:170b-4: rnam pa bzhi chos kyi dbyings la 'da' ba'i phyir
T02D2624:170b-5: mtshon pa'i rtags su phyi'i gru chad kyi lha mo'i
T02D2624:170b-7: dus snga ma dang phyis ye nas ma skyes pa'i
T02D2624:170b-8: chos nyid du la 'da' ba'i phyir badzra dh'u pe
T02D2624:170b-9: ste / tshul khrims kyi dris nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:170b-10: dus da lta dang dbyar gyi ngo bo gnas su dag pa ni badzra pushpe ste /
T02D2624:170b-11: ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems me tog tu gtor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:170b-13: ston ma skyes pa ni badzra a'a lo ke ste /
T02D2624:170b-14: yang dag pa'i shes rab sgron ma lta bu rtogs pa'i yul lo //
T02D2624:170b-15: dus 'byung ba dang dgun gyi ngo bo ye nas
T02D2624:170b-16: stong zhing mi dmigs pa'i mtshon pa'i rtags badzra gandhe
T02D2624:170b-17: ste / shes rab ye nas dag pas rtogs pa'i yul lo //
T02D2624:170b-18: de rnams ni ye shes rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D2624:170b-19: phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa
T02D2624:170b-20: yang chos nyid las ma g-yos pa'i rtags su ba
T02D2624:170b-21: stan no // phyi nang gi lha mo'i don ba stan zin to //
T02D2624:170b-22: da ni ye shes kyi phrin las tshang med pa bzhi ste /
T02D2624:170b-23: bsdu ba dang dngos po rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i rtags sgo ba bzhi'i don te /
T02D2624:170b-24: sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02D2624:170b-25: sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya //
T02D2624:170b-27: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi lcags kyus 'khor ba'i
T02D2624:170b-28: sems can nyon mongs pa las 'byin pa'i rags su
T02D2624:170b-30: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes zhags pa dang 'khor ba dag 'dzin pa'i rtags su zhags par ba stan /
T02D2624:170b-31: ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi ngo bor gnyis su
T02D2624:170b-32: med par ston pa'i rtags su lcags sgrog tu ba
T02D2624:170b-33: stan / gsung rab rgya mtsho'i ngo bos chos ston pa'i rtags su dril bur ba stan /
T02D2624:170b-34: de ni ye shes kyi sprul pas sgo smos so //
T02D2624:170b-35: da ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i rgyal sras /
T02D2624:170b-36: sngon gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2624:170b-37: zhing khams mtha' yas par shes pa'i rtsa la sbyong
T02D2624:170b-38: ba sngon gyi bsod nams kyis 'dul ba'i dus la
T02D2624:171a-1: chub sems dpa' bcu drug smos te /
T02D2624:171a-2: rim pa dang po'i snam bu la bkod pa'i don te /
T02D2624:171a-4: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
T02D2624:171a-5: byams pa la sogs bri bar bya //
T02D2624:171a-7: thugs chos nyid las ma g-yos pa'i rtags su ni /
T02D2624:171a-8: shar phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi ba stan te /
T02D2624:171a-9: bdag don mthar phyin pas gzhan don rtse gcig tu mdzad pas na byams pa'o //
T02D2624:171a-10: snying rje'i blo mkhyen pas 'jam pa'i dpal dang /
T02D2624:171a-11: tshul khrims kyi stobs dang ldan pa spos kyi glang po dang /
T02D2624:171a-12: thabs mkhas pa phrin las kyis 'gro ba'i re 'dod
T02D2624:171a-13: skong ba ye shes tog dang bzhi shar phyogs khyams
T02D2624:171a-14: su bri'o // lho phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi smos te /
T02D2624:171a-15: lta ba dang spyod pa yongs su dag pas thams cad chos nyid la 'da' bas bzang skyod dang /
T02D2624:171a-16: lta spyod rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa don yod mthong dang /
T02D2624:171a-17: chos nyid kyi don la thugs rjes char 'bebs pa nam mkha'i mdzod dang /
T02D2624:171a-18: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa mi zad pa dang blo gros mi zad pa dang bzhi bri'o //
T02D2624:171a-19: nub kyi sems dpa' yon tan gyi tshogs rdzogs pas na nub phyogs kyi bzhi smos te /
T02D2624:171a-20: brtson 'grus kyi don dang ldan pas spobs pa brtsegs dang /
T02D2624:171a-21: mi shes pa'i ri bo 'joms pas mthu chen po thob dang /
T02D2624:171a-22: yang dag pa'i shes rab 'khor ba gting nas 'joms pas ngan song kun 'dren dang /
T02D2624:171a-23: yang dag pa'i shes rab gzung 'dzin gyi skyon spangs
T02D2624:171a-24: pa ngan song kun 'joms dang bzhir gzung 'dzin rnam
T02D2624:171a-26: byang phyogs sems dpa' bzhi smos te /
T02D2624:171a-27: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa dra ba can dang /
T02D2624:171a-28: 'khor ba'i skyon gyi zug rdu dang bral ba zla 'od dang /
T02D2624:171a-29: bsam pa mngon par rtogs pa dang ldan pa bdud rtsi 'od dang /
T02D2624:171a-30: lta spyod ye nas dag pa kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po bzhi /
T02D2624:171a-31: sgrib gnyis byang bas na byang phyogs su bri'o //
T02D2624:171a-32: bskal ba bzang po'i don ba stan zin to //
T02D2624:171a-33: bskal bzang gi snam bu la dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug spel mar 'byung ste /
T02D2624:171a-34: dpe bcu drug ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes la skyes nas /
T02D2624:171a-35: dbang du thugs rje'i sku 'byung zhing nyon mongs pa las rgyal bar byed pas rgyal zhes bya'o //
T02D2624:171b-0: @171b da ni theg pa chung du rnams gzengs stong
T02D2624:171b-1: par byed pa'i thabs su phyung bas ci'i phyir zhe
T02D2624:171b-2: na / nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang //
T02D2624:171b-4: de la nyan thos sna la smos pa ni /
T02D2624:171b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs 'dul ba'i zhing yin pa'i phyir smos la /
T02D2624:171b-6: dpe med pa phyin smos pa ni /
T02D2624:171b-7: thugs rjes 'dul ba'i zhing la 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2624:171b-8: tshig bsgyur pa'i thabs logs su shes par bya'o //
T02D2624:171b-9: de la dpe med pa bcu drug ni /
T02D2624:171b-10: shar du thugs mchog dpe med pa bzhi ste me
T02D2624:171b-11: long lta bu'i ye shes kyis thabs mkhas pa'i thugs
T02D2624:171b-12: rjes 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pas na ngan 'joms /
T02D2624:171b-13: nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bas na nyon mongs mun sel /
T02D2624:171b-14: sdug bsngal 'joms par byed pas ngan song 'dren mdzad /
T02D2624:171b-15: nyon mongs pa 'joms pas srid pa'i mtsho sgrol /
T02D2624:171b-16: sku mdog dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:171b-17: lho phyogs su sems can gyi 'dod pa bskang ba'i phyir /
T02D2624:171b-18: yon tan dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi smos te /
T02D2624:171b-19: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa'i dgos 'dod skong ba rin chen mdzod /
T02D2624:171b-20: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi dga' ba dang ldan pa dge ba blo gros /
T02D2624:171b-21: yang dag pa'i don mthun par smra bas na don
T02D2624:171b-22: mthun yid 'ong [*'od?] yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2624:171b-23: dran pa dang ldan pas dran pa'i stobs mchog sku
T02D2624:171b-24: mdog sngon po rin chen 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:171b-25: nub tu gsung mchog dpe med pa bzhi smos te /
T02D2624:171b-26: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi nga ro dang ldan pas na dge ba'i 'byung gnas dang /
T02D2624:171b-27: legs pa'i yon tan ldan pas legs pa'i tog /
T02D2624:171b-28: nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams srid pa'i mtsho las
T02D2624:171b-29: sgrol bas na srid mtsho sgrol /
T02D2624:171b-30: bden pa'i gsung rnam par dag pas na bde ba'i 'byung gnas so //
T02D2624:171b-31: sku mdog dmar po padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:171b-32: byang phyogs su phrin las dpe med pa bzhi smos te /
T02D2624:171b-33: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rab tu 'bar bas /
T02D2624:171b-34: brtson 'grus kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na brtson 'grus mi ldog pa /
T02D2624:171b-35: che ba'i yon tan chen po dang ldan pas na ston mdzad do //
T02D2624:171b-36: sems can gyi the tshom gyi thag pa gcod pas na the tshom nyid 'gyur /
T02D2624:172a-0: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi nga ro dang ldan @172a * //
T02D2624:172a-2: sku mdog ljang gu me tog autpala bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:172a-3: de rnams mtshan ma'i dngos po dang bral bas na dpe med /
T02D2624:172a-4: dang po'i skyon gyis mi tshugs pas na rgyal ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2624:172a-5: da ni ston pa'i sku'i zhabs 'bri nag sprul pa'i
T02D2624:172a-6: sku'i 'khor yin pas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2624:172a-7: snam bu gnyis yod pa'i tha ma la bri ste
T02D2624:172a-9: gzhan la rag lus pa'i phyir na ston pa la
T02D2624:172a-10: gus par nyan cing rna ba'i dbang pos thos nas
T02D2624:172a-11: gzhan la ston pa'i phyir na nyan thos so //
T02D2624:172a-12: spyir ni dge slong stong nyid brgya lnga bcu 'dus pa'i tshe yod kyang /
T02D2624:172a-13: 'dir gtso bo mchog bcu drug bri bar 'byung bar smos te /
T02D2624:172a-14: nyid kyi gcung po dga' bo //
T02D2624:172a-16: shes rab can gyi mchog sh'a ri'i bu /
T02D2624:172a-17: 'dri zhing lan ldon pa la mkhas pa'i mchog rab 'byor shar phyogs su'o //
T02D2624:172a-18: rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog mood gal /
T02D2624:172a-19: yab rgyal po zas gtsang la sogs pa khyim pa dad pa skyed pa 'char ka'o //
T02D2624:172a-20: rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /
T02D2624:172a-21: ston pa las dam pa'i chos thos pa snga ba koo ntin+ya dang /
T02D2624:172a-23: bdud kyi gtso bo dad par byed pa rta thul /
T02D2624:172a-24: 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i ba
T02D2624:172a-25: glang bdag / zhabs 'bri nag gnyug mar gnas pa
T02D2624:172a-26: kun dga' bo // sh'akya rnams kyi skra 'breg mkhan yin pas na sh'akya ming chen /
T02D2624:172a-27: bslab pa kun spyin nor spyin 'dzin /
T02D2624:172a-28: sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin yin pas gang po //
T02D2624:172a-29: zhal ta ba sku bgres pas 'od srungs de rnams bri'o //
T02D2624:172a-30: de rnams ni drang srong dang /
T02D2624:172a-32: bsil yab dang rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:172a-33: nyan thos rnams kyi don ba stan zin to //
T02D2624:172a-34: da ni nyan thos kyi snam bu la rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang spel mar bri bar 'byung ste /
T02D2624:172a-36: de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams //
T02D2624:172a-38: de ni sngon nyan thos blo rnon po rnams shugs kyis /
T02D2624:172a-39: smon lam dbang btsan pas sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i
T02D2624:172a-40: zhing khams rang gi byang chub rang gis tshol zhing
T02D2624:172a-41: rnyed pas na rang rgyal ba'o //
T02D2624:172a-42: de la bcu gnyis bri ste /
T02D2624:172b-0: nyon mongs 'joms @172b pas gdung sel dang /
T02D2624:172b-1: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pas na snang ba brtsegs pa dang /
T02D2624:172b-2: 'khor ba skrag par byed pa'i don mnga' bas na rang sangs rgyas 'jigs par byed pa dang /
T02D2624:172b-4: 'khor ba'i rlung gis mi bskyod pas na ri bo rgyal /
T02D2624:172b-5: shes pa'i rtsal dang ldan pas na shes rab mgyogs chen /
T02D2624:172b-6: 'khor bas mi bsnyel bas dpa' bo 'dul ba lho phyogs su'o //
T02D2624:172b-7: gsung gi sgra dang ldan pas na sgra chen /
T02D2624:172b-8: ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig par gyur pas na bse ru lta bu /
T02D2624:172b-9: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel bas na gdung sel nub phyogs su'o //
T02D2624:172b-10: sprul pa'i cho 'phrul dang ldan pa na rdzu 'phrul cher ston /
T02D2624:172b-11: 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bas na seng ge lta bu dang /
T02D2624:172b-12: ting nge 'dzin 'gyur bas na rang sangs rgyas pa yid gyur te /
T02D2624:172b-13: de rnams ni bsil yab dang zla ba tshes pa dang /
T02D2624:172b-15: rang sangs rgyas bshad zin to /
T02D2624:172b-17: // / da ni rnam par thar pa brgyang kyi rtags
T02D2624:172b-18: sgo gsum pa'i bar ma 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2624:172b-21: khro bo mngag gzhug pho nya'i tshogs //
T02D2624:172b-22: bri ba'am yang na ming yang rung //
T02D2624:172b-24: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi nyon mongs pa la khro bas khro ba'o //
T02D2624:172b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las mdzad pas na /
T02D2624:172b-27: sprul pa sna tshogs su 'gyed pas na pho nya'o //
T02D2624:172b-28: de'i rtags kyi cha 'dzin pas na khro bo brgyang
T02D2624:172b-29: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gsum
T02D2624:172b-30: la rab tu gsal bas na 'jig rten gsum snang
T02D2624:172b-31: ngo // thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes 'jig rten 'dul bas na 'jig rten gsum 'dul lo //
T02D2624:172b-32: shar phyogs kyi sgo g-yas g-yon gnyis so //
T02D2624:172b-33: mnyam nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa 'jig pas na 'jig rten gsum 'jig go //
T02D2624:172b-34: nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba las thar par byed pas
T02D2624:172b-35: na 'jig rten thar byed de lho'i sgo g-yas g-yon
T02D2624:172b-36: no // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang ldan pas na /
T02D2624:172b-38: yang dag pa'i be con bsnams pas nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2624:172b-39: mtshan ma 'joms te be con can ni nub kyi
T02D2624:173a-1: gyi ye shes kyi phrin las dang ldan pas na /
T02D2624:173a-2: mtshan mas mi g-yo bas na mi g-yo mgon po'o //
T02D2624:173a-3: gsung rnam par dag pa'i skal ba dang ldan pas na rta mgrin no //
T02D2624:173a-4: byang gi sgo g-yas g-yon no //
T02D2624:173a-5: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don du byung ste //
T02D2624:173a-6: ming ngam thig le'am mtshan ma gang rung bri zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:173a-7: de rnams ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor lha brgya rtsa lnga bshad zin to /
T02D2624:173a-9: // / da ni 'jig rten pa'i snam bu gnyis yod pa'i mandala gyi don to //
T02D2624:173a-11: phyi yid kyil 'khor phyi rim du //
T02D2624:173a-12: gling bzhi bo ni bri bar bya //
T02D2624:173a-14: 'dzam bu gling du tshangs pa bri /
T02D2624:173a-15: phyi ni 'jig rten pa yin pa'i phyir smos la /
T02D2624:173a-16: dkyil 'khor ni gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa bri zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:173a-18: phyogs bzhin ma 'dres pa'i phyir smos la 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri ba ni /
T02D2624:173a-19: 'dzam bu'i lho phyogs la tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2624:173a-20: yab kyi na panytsi ka dang /
T02D2624:173a-21: yum lha mo dpal ldan mo gnyis yid kyis bshos pa'i sras zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:173a-23: sum brgya drug cu yod pa'i nang nas /
T02D2624:173a-24: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni /
T02D2624:173a-25: sras thu bo'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pas tsha ba'i gdung ba dang bral bas tshangs pa /
T02D2624:173a-27: lta ba'i skyon gyis mgos pas na tshangs pa'o //
T02D2624:173a-28: srid pa skos 'de bas pas na 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa'o //
T02D2624:173a-30: btsun mo tshangs pa'i bang thogs pa dang /
T02D2624:173a-31: pho nya ni mngags pa ste padma /
T02D2624:173a-32: mngag gzhug yid du 'ong ba ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:173a-33: byang phyogs su dbang phyug che zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:173a-34: dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su bri ba ste /
T02D2624:173a-35: lha'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir na dbang phyug go //
T02D2624:173a-36: phyag na tri sh'ul yum dka' thub zlog ma phyag na padma kha phye ba bsnams pa /
T02D2624:173a-37: pho nya rnam par snang ba dang /
T02D2624:173a-38: mngag gzhug ded dpon nag po mda' dang gzhu bsnams te de bzhi bri'o //
T02D2624:173a-39: shar dang nub kyi gling du brgya byin khyab 'jug
T02D2624:173a-40: thams cad kyang zhes pa ni shar phyogs su lha'i
T02D2624:173a-42: nor bu tir+ya ka brgya byin cing /
T02D2624:173b-0: mchod spyin rgyal @173b btang ba dang /
T02D2624:173b-2: ting nge 'dzin brgya la snyoms par 'jug / sangs
T02D2624:173b-3: rgyas brgya mthong zhing khams brgya sbyong bas brgya byin
T02D2624:173b-4: phyag na rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:173b-5: btsun mo bde sogs dgu bo rgyud mangs 'dren /
T02D2624:173b-6: mngag gzug yid du 'ong ba lha'i bu kun du [*kun tu?] snang ba ral gri 'dzin /
T02D2624:173b-7: pho nya rab tu myur ba'i shugs can rtse gsum pa bsnams zhes pa'o //
T02D2624:173b-8: khyab 'jug gi thugs kun du [*kun tu?] khyab pa
T02D2624:173b-9: la phrin las ni kun du [*kun tu?] 'jug ces
T02D2624:173b-10: bya'o // yab ni mtha' bral lha'i dbang po ba su ta de ba /
T02D2624:173b-11: yum ni ga na pa ti phyag na 'khor lo bsnams /
T02D2624:173b-12: btsun mo dpal mo phyag na gsal zhing bsnams /
T02D2624:173b-13: mngag gzhug rdo rje bde ba phyag na mche ba bsnams /
T02D2624:173b-14: pho nya rdo rje ded dpon phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa bri ste /
T02D2624:173b-15: bcu drug sde nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
T02D2624:173b-16: lha min mkha' lding dri za dang //
T02D2624:173b-19: mi yang mi yin pas na lha ma yin te /
T02D2624:173b-20: phrag dog zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bri ste /
T02D2624:173b-21: lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnam par snang byed /
T02D2624:173b-22: mda' dang gzhu bzhu bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:173b-23: sgra gcan 'dzin zla ba bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:173b-24: sum brtsegs ri bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:173b-25: he ran ke shu rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D2624:173b-26: kun du [*kun tu?] snang ba me long bsnams pa /
T02D2624:173b-27: btsun mo dang bcu gnyis bri'o //
T02D2624:173b-28: mkha' lding ni nam mkha' lding ste /
T02D2624:173b-29: gser mig lcags kyu bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:173b-30: g-yog du ma can rdo rje bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:173b-31: bya khyung ga ru na gnam lcags kyi sbar zhags bsnams pa dang gsum /
T02D2624:173b-32: btsun mo gsum ste drug dang rtsa brgyang do //
T02D2624:173b-33: dri za ni dri za ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2624:173b-34: gos su sprin gon nas snang la mi snang ba'i phyir smos te /
T02D2624:173b-35: zur phud lnga pa me tog gi phreng ba bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:173b-36: yul 'khor srung ba pi wang bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:173b-37: btsun mo gnyis dang bzhi ste /
T02D2624:173b-39: de ltar lha bzhi bcu rtsa gsum byang drang po nas shar phyogs su dngar te bri'o //
T02D2624:173b-40: gnod spyin srin po lto 'phye zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:173b-41: sems gnod pa dang bcas shing /
T02D2624:173b-42: sems pas nor sgrubs shing spyin pa'i phyir na gnod spyin no //
T02D2624:173b-44: shar phyogs su yang dag shes zla tshes bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174a-1: po che'i sgrom bu bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174a-2: nub tu nor bu bzang po nor bu bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174a-3: byang na dzamdha la ne'u le'i rgyal pa bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174a-4: shar lhor gang ba bzang po bum pa /
T02D2624:174a-5: lho nub tu ku be ra be con /
T02D2624:174a-6: nub byang du panytsi ka rin chen mdzod /
T02D2624:174a-7: byang shar du nor lha'i rgyal po shing tog / btsun mo brgyang dang bcu drug go //
T02D2624:174a-8: srin po ni 'jigs shing bsod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:174a-9: lang ka mgrin bcu mda' gzhu /
T02D2624:174a-12: btsun mo dang drug ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D2624:174a-14: ltos 'gro ba'i phyir na rkang la med de lto 'phye'o //
T02D2624:174a-15: rab brtan rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174a-16: khyus 'gro ni rin po che bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174a-17: btsun mo gnyis dang bzhis te nyi shu rtsa drug go //
T02D2624:174a-18: de ltar na lha brgyang cu rtsa bdun no //
T02D2624:174a-21: lta ba log pa las byung ba'i phyir 'byung po'o //
T02D2624:174a-22: dbang ldan ni phyag na tri sh'u la ste /
T02D2624:174a-23: btsun mo dang gnyis te byang shar mtshams su gong ma dang bsres la bri /
T02D2624:174a-24: yi dvags kyis zas 'dod kyang za bar bgegs yod pas yi dvags so //
T02D2624:174a-25: phyi yi sgrib pa can dang /
T02D2624:174a-26: nang gi sgrib pa can dang /
T02D2624:174a-27: rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa can /
T02D2624:174a-28: me lce'i 'khor lo can dang sgo khyud can dang bzhi'o //
T02D2624:174a-29: 'dre ni bar du gcod pa'i bgegs byed pas na log 'dren nag po chu ltar g-yo ba sprul /
T02D2624:174a-32: se'u nya na snying du 'jug pa'i 'dre dang /
T02D2624:174a-33: dar dbyangs te lce la 'jug pa /
T02D2624:174a-34: myur rgan te myur bar 'jug pa ral gri bsnams pa dang drug go //
T02D2624:174a-35: 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan ni 'khor bco lnga yod do //
T02D2624:174a-36: ri dvags kyi rgyal po ri dvags kyi gdon dang /
T02D2624:174a-37: skem byed ni gzhon nu'i gzugs su ston pa'i gdon dang /
T02D2624:174a-38: brjed byed pa ni wa 'dra dang /
T02D2624:174a-39: khu tshur can ni bya rog 'dra ba dang /
T02D2624:174a-41: srul po phag gi gzugs dang /
T02D2624:174a-43: 'dod pa can rdo rje'i gzugs dang /
T02D2624:174a-44: mrga [*ma rga?] byed pa byi la'i gzugs dang /
T02D2624:174a-46: gnya' lag can bya gag gi gzugs dang /
T02D2624:174a-47: bya ni 'dab chags kyi gzugs dang /
T02D2624:174b-0: mig 'phyang po ni pha wang gi gzugs @174b dang ;
T02D2624:174b-1: 'jam pa ni ba glang gi gzugs dang /
T02D2624:174b-2: ma mo ni mi'i gzugs dang bco lnga ste /
T02D2624:174b-3: de ltar brgya dgu bcu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D2624:174b-4: klu dang sprul dang ri dvags rnams //
T02D2624:174b-6: klu ni byol song gi rigs te /
T02D2624:174b-7: rgya mtshon gnas pa phrag dog dang ldan pa bri ste /
T02D2624:174b-8: mtha' yas autpala bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:174b-10: chu lha padma'i sdong po dang /
T02D2624:174b-12: nor rgyas bum pa bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174b-13: stobs kyi rgyu sprul gyi gshol mda' bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174b-15: padma chen po padma kha phye ba bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174b-16: rigs ldan rin chen rkyal bu bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174b-17: dga' bo sprin phung dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174b-18: nye dga' po rin chen 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02D2624:174b-19: sprul ni btsun mo bdes mgul nas 'khyud cing mdzes
T02D2624:174b-20: pa'i rgyan du byas pa ste nyi shu tham pa'o
T02D2624:174b-22: phyogs skyong ba bcu ni bgegs kyi rigs su gtogs bas rigs rnams so //
T02D2624:174b-24: gshin rje thod dbyug / chu lha sprul zhags /
T02D2624:174b-32: zla ba autpala so so'i btsun mo yang gtso bo
T02D2624:174b-33: dang mthun pa can du bri ste nyi shu rtsa
T02D2624:174b-34: gsum / de ltar nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bdun so so'i phyogs su bri'o //
T02D2624:174b-35: rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya //
T02D2624:174b-38: shar du yul 'khor srung pi wang /
T02D2624:174b-40: nub tu spyan mi bzang sbrul zhags /
T02D2624:174b-41: byang du rnam thos sras ba dan /
T02D2624:174b-43: de ltar lha nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lda'o //
T02D2624:174b-44: gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang //
T02D2624:174b-46: gza' ni 'phel ba dang 'grib par ston te /
T02D2624:174b-48: pa ba sangs me tog / phur bu pu ste /
T02D2624:174b-51: mig dmar bdud rtsi'i bum pa /
T02D2624:174b-54: spen pa dbyug tho btsun mo dang bcu drug go //
T02D2624:174b-55: rgyu skar ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba ste /
T02D2624:174b-56: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas me lha'i phyogs su /
T02D2624:175a-1: drug mdog dmar bum pa'i steng na bzhugs /
T02D2624:175a-2: snar ma mdog dmar glang khyu pa dkar mo la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-3: mgo ser po sha ba zhon /
T02D2624:175a-4: lag dmar po sprul la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-5: nab so ser po padma la 'dug / rgyal ljang
T02D2624:175a-6: gu bum pa la 'dug / skag ljang gu bya
T02D2624:175a-7: rog la 'dug / phyag na rin po che'i shing
T02D2624:175a-8: thog bsnams pa'o // me'i phyogs nas /
T02D2624:175a-9: bden bral gyi phyogs su dngar ba la /
T02D2624:175a-10: mchu ser ma he la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-11: gre ljang khri la 'dug / sbo ser gser khri
T02D2624:175a-12: la 'dug / me bzhi ser glang po che la
T02D2624:175a-13: zhon / nag pa ljang rma bya la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-14: sa ri dmar lcang mo la 'dug /
T02D2624:175a-15: sa ga rta dkar po la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-16: phyag mtshan rin po che'i shing thog bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:175a-17: bden bral gyi phyogs nas rlung lha'i phyogs su dngar ba la /
T02D2624:175a-18: lha mtshams mdog ser bya'i sha tshugs 'dra bya la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-19: snron dmar gdan par tshangs can la 'dug / snubs mdog ljang gu sbal pa la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-20: chu stod mdog ser phub la 'dug / chu smad ljang gu byi ba la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-21: byi zhun mdog sngo sre mong zhon /
T02D2624:175a-22: gro zhun mdog dmar skur ma la 'dug / phyag mtshan padma'i sdong bu sha stag bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:175a-23: rlung gi phyogs nas dbang ldan bar dngar ba la /
T02D2624:175a-24: mon dre ljang glang khyu ba dkar po zhon /
T02D2624:175a-25: mon gru mdog dmar stan nang tshangs can la 'dug
T02D2624:175a-26: / khrums stod ljang ser khri la 'dug / khrums
T02D2624:175a-27: smad ser po rin chen khri la 'dug / nam
T02D2624:175a-28: gru dmar po rta la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-29: tha skar ljang gu mi la zhon /
T02D2624:175a-30: bra nye sngon po 'khor lo'i steng na 'dug / phyag na autpala sha stags bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:175a-31: de ltar rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyang de /
T02D2624:175a-32: de ltar lha nyis brgya brgyang cu rtsa dgu'o //
T02D2624:175a-33: khro bo ma rungs 'tshe ba ni //
T02D2624:175a-35: khro bo ma rungs pa dmyal ba ste /
T02D2624:175a-36: las kyi bag chags khros pa'i mthu las snang ste /
T02D2624:175a-38: phyin ci log pa'i rtog pa ngan pas bltas pas /
T02D2624:175a-39: gshin rje rab tu khros pa ni shin tu mi bzad par snang ste /
T02D2624:175a-40: de'i 'khor ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa las /
T02D2624:175a-41: mdor bsdu na tsha grang gnyis te /
T02D2624:175b-9: padma ltar gas pa chen po ste brgyang do //
T02D2624:175b-11: mtha' 'khor ba gnyis te bco brgyang kyang /
T02D2624:175b-12: ming ngam brda'am thig le bri /
T02D2624:175b-13: me'i phyogs nas dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bskor te bri'o //
T02D2624:175b-14: 'tshe ba ni nyon mongs pa lnga'i cha shas sdug
T02D2624:175b-15: bsngal gyi bdag gis gzhan la 'tshe bar byed pa
T02D2624:175b-16: dang / gzhan bdag la 'tshe ba'i phyir na 'tshe ba'o //
T02D2624:175b-20: nga rgyal rtsangs pa dang bzhi ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis de ltar lha sum brgya bcu gcig go //
T02D2624:175b-21: bgegs dang bi na ya ka ni //
T02D2624:175b-24: dge ba'i bar du gcod cing mtho ris dang thar pa la sgrib pa'i phyir na bgegs te /
T02D2624:175b-25: spyir ni stong phrag brgyang cu rtsa bzhi yod pa la /
T02D2624:175b-26: 'dir ni rnam pa brgyang smos te /
T02D2624:175b-27: tshangs pa srin po'i gdon dang /
T02D2624:175b-32: ma mo'i gdon dang drug gi steng du /
T02D2624:175b-33: gtso bo bi na yag 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02D2624:175b-35: lha sum brgya bcu dgu dang /
T02D2624:175b-36: sems can kun la phan byed pa'i //
T02D2624:175b-37: drang srong skal ba chen po rnams //
T02D2624:175b-39: sems ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyang la /
T02D2624:175b-40: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang 'brel pa /
T02D2624:175b-41: kun ni khams gsum pa kun yin te /
T02D2624:175b-42: phan pa ni thabs mkhas pa'i sgo nas byed pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:175b-44: drang ba ni skyon spangs pa yin la /
T02D2624:175b-45: srong ba lam drang po la srong ba yin pas so //
T02D2624:175b-46: skal ba chen por brtul zhugs dang mthu che ba'i phyir na skal ba chen po ste /
T02D2624:175b-47: rnams ni mchog brgyang bri ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02D2624:175b-48: drang srong mes bzhi rin po che 'bar ba /
T02D2624:175b-52: gya gyur rin po che'i sgrom /
T02D2624:175b-55: g-yog dor 'khor lo bsnams pa ste /
T02D2624:175b-56: me lha'i 'khor ba nas shar lho'i mtshams nas dngar te bri /
T02D2624:175b-57: de ltar lha sum brgya nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
T02D2624:176a-3: mkha' 'gro ni las dang rdzu 'phrul dang stobs kyis mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
T02D2624:176a-4: bdud kyi rgyal po mdag pa yin te /
T02D2624:176a-5: rnam pa brgyang du ba stan to //
T02D2624:176a-6: l'a ma koo r'i ma byis dbyug dang /
T02D2624:176a-7: l'a ma tsoo r'i ma mda' gzhu dang /
T02D2624:176a-8: l'a ma phra mo ha rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2624:176a-9: l'a ma be t'a l'i rdo rje /
T02D2624:176a-10: l'a ma pukka s'i rgyu zhags /
T02D2624:176a-11: l'a ma gtasma r'i thod pa /
T02D2624:176a-12: l'a ma tsanda l'i rtse gsum /
T02D2624:176a-13: l'a ma sma sha l'i rin po che 'bar ba /
T02D2624:176a-15: bud med ni ma mo chen mo ste /
T02D2624:176a-16: bud med kyi tshul du gnas pa bud med bco lnga ste /
T02D2624:176a-17: de ltar lha sum brgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D2624:176a-18: de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2624:176a-20: de bzhin gong ma dang 'dra bar bud med kyi
T02D2624:176a-21: tshul du gnas pas de bzhin srid mo ni bzhi
T02D2624:176a-22: ste / rgyal ma padma bsnams pa dang /
T02D2624:176a-23: rnam par rgyal ma rdo rje bsnams /
T02D2624:176a-26: sring mo ltar gdung ba'i phyir na srid mo'o //
T02D2624:176a-31: sku chos nyid la rnal 'byor rtags brgyang du ba stan pas na /
T02D2624:176a-35: rnam par rgyal ba rgyal mtshan //
T02D2624:176a-41: de ni 'jig rten pa'i 'khor dgar gzhug pa'i phyir na /
T02D2624:176a-43: 'jig rten pa'i snam bu la bri ste /
T02D2624:176a-44: de ltar lha sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D2624:176a-45: 'byung ba bzhi'i lha chen zhes pa ni dngos po'i
T02D2624:176a-46: 'byung ba'i gzhi med par 'byung pas na 'byung po'o
T02D2624:176a-47: // smin par byed pas me lha gsal ba'i 'od zer me dpung bsnams /
T02D2624:176a-48: sdud par byed pas ba ru na sprul zhags bsnams /
T02D2624:176a-49: g-yo bar byed pas ba ya be sbud pa /
T02D2624:176a-50: snang bar byed pas sa bdag lag chen 'khor lo //
T02D2624:176a-51: de dag ni phyogs skyong bcu'i 'khor du bsdus pa yang yod /
T02D2624:176a-52: grangs kyi khyad par spyir gtong pa yang yod /
T02D2624:176a-53: khyim dang ri la gnas pa yang //
T02D2624:176a-54: zhes pa ni khyim gyi lha ste /
T02D2624:176a-55: kun du [*kun tu?] snang ba rin chen sgrom //
T02D2624:176a-56: ri la brten cing gnas pa ni //
T02D2624:176b-0: ri'i lha @176b rab tu brtan pa'i blo gros rin po che 'bar ba /
T02D2624:176b-2: ljon shing skye ba'i bdag po byed pas shing gi lha /
T02D2624:176b-3: kun nas 'od zer shing thog bsnams /
T02D2624:176b-6: dge 'dun gyi rab rnams bsrung bas kun dga' ra ba'i lha /
T02D2624:176b-7: kun du [*kun tu?] snang ba'i blo gros ljon shing bsnams /
T02D2624:176b-8: gnas la brten cing bsrung bas na /
T02D2624:176b-9: gnas kyi lha tshogs sgo ste /
T02D2624:176b-11: dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa rnams //
T02D2624:176b-13: dur ni sdud pa la khrod ni 'byung bas te /
T02D2624:176b-14: mi ro rnams kyi khog srung byed pa'i 'dre 'byung ba'o //
T02D2624:176b-15: dge ba kha tv'am ga bsnams /
T02D2624:176b-18: yul khams tsam re re la bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02D2624:176b-19: grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams dge ba'i blo gros phyag na rin po che 'bar ba bsnams /
T02D2624:176b-21: phyogs skyong khongs su btang ba ni /
T02D2624:176b-22: lha sum brgya drug cu rtsa gcig btang ba ni
T02D2624:176b-23: sum brgya drug cu rtsa lngar 'dod ming ngam brda'am
T02D2624:176b-24: yang na thig le rnams kyang bri bar bya zhes
T02D2624:176b-25: pa ni / ming ni btags pa'i rang bzhin du smos pa'o //
T02D2624:176b-28: tshom bu byas nas gzhag pa'o //
T02D2624:176b-29: de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:176b-30: de nas skabs kyi rting thogs su byung ba la bya /
T02D2624:176b-31: mkhas pa ni sgrub pa po gdams ngag dang bcas
T02D2624:176b-32: pa gtan tshigs dang sgra sbyor bye brag kun la
T02D2624:176b-33: mkhas pa'o // dkyil 'khor ni kun rig rtsa ba'i
T02D2624:176b-34: mandala chen po ste smos pa 'di nyid la bya'o
T02D2624:176b-35: mkhas pa'o // // kun rig ni dus gsum ma 'dres par mkhyen pa /
T02D2624:176b-36: rtsa ba ni byang chub sems /
T02D2624:176b-37: dkyil ni byang chub sems gzung 'dzin dang bral bas /
T02D2624:176b-38: 'khor ni de las che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba'o //
T02D2624:176b-39: chen po ni phrin las dang thugs rje chen por
T02D2624:176b-40: ston pa'i lha sum brgya drug cu po de dag
T02D2624:176b-41: kyang sku gsum dang 'khor du spyar ro //
T02D2624:176b-42: de yar kun rig rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi sku /
T02D2624:176b-44: rigs kyi yum longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
T02D2624:176b-46: dpe med pa man chad thugs rje sprul ba'i sku /
T02D2624:177a-0: nyan thos nas grong khyer gyi lha la thug @177a * //
T02D2624:177a-1: ba'i bar thams cad sprul ba'i sku'i 'khor te /
T02D2624:177a-2: thugs rje sprul pa tha dad par ston pas na /
T02D2624:177a-3: 'khor yang tha dad par bris pas /
T02D2624:177a-4: mchod ba dbul zhing mandala gzhung bzhin du byas na
T02D2624:177a-5: bsod nams kyi tshogs skye'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go
T02D2624:177a-6: // da ni mandala gyi rgyan chos ston te /
T02D2624:177a-8: bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang //
T02D2624:177a-10: bza' dang btung ba spyar ba legs //
T02D2624:177a-12: khams gsum gyi bla mar gyur pas bla re dang /
T02D2624:177a-13: bdud las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2624:177a-14: thugs rje'i phrin las kyi lhab lhub dang /
T02D2624:177a-15: byang chub sems kyi gdugs dang /
T02D2624:177a-16: phrin las kyi rnga yab dang /
T02D2624:177a-20: gser gyi bum pa bcu drug dang /
T02D2624:177a-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya ba stan pa dang /
T02D2624:177a-23: ye shes kyi bum pa lnga /
T02D2624:177a-24: rigs lnga'i chus bkang la gzhag pa dang /
T02D2624:177a-25: shes rab kyi mar me dang /
T02D2624:177a-28: ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2624:177a-29: yan lag brgyang dang ldan pa'i yon chab la sogs
T02D2624:177a-30: pa'i btung ba rnams kyi mandala gyi rgyan chas mchod
T02D2624:177a-32: 'khor gyi 'byung po'i kha zas la sogs pa rnams ni bde ste bshad mi dgos /
T02D2624:177a-33: da ni slob dpon mandala la 'jug pa ston te /
T02D2624:177a-34: de nas khrus la sogs pa byas nas zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:177a-35: de nas mandala gyi rgyan chas la sogs pa tshang ba'i rting thogs la bya ste /
T02D2624:177a-36: khrus ni rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa byin gyis brlabs nas phyi'i lus bkru ba dang /
T02D2624:177a-37: rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis nang gi sems bkru ba dang /
T02D2624:177a-41: dkar gsum la sogs pa bza' zhing /
T02D2624:177a-42: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2624:177a-43: rig pa'i me tog thogs la /
T02D2624:177a-45: phyag rgya rnam bzhis gzugs brnyan la phab ste /
T02D2624:177a-48: slob dpon mandala du 'jug ba ba stan zin to //
T02D2624:177a-49: da ni slob dpon zhugs pa'i yon tan mtshan ma thob pa'i rtags ston te /
T02D2624:177b-0: @177b de nas mtshan ma skyes te mgu nas ni zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:177b-1: de nas ni zhugs pa'i rting thogs so //
T02D2624:177b-2: mtshan ma ni dngos grub kyi rtags te /
T02D2624:177b-4: 'od dam rlangs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2624:177b-5: skyes te ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu las skye ba dang /
T02D2624:177b-6: sngon bsags kyi dge bas skye ba'o //
T02D2624:177b-7: mgu nas ni rang gi ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig
T02D2624:177b-8: pas mgu nas rtse gcig pa dang mandala gyis 'phags
T02D2624:177b-9: pa dgyes nas dngos grub ster ba'o //
T02D2624:177b-10: thog ma dang tha ma med par mngon sum mthong gi / sngon bsags pa yod na ni /
T02D2624:177b-11: dngos grub kyi rtags nye ste /
T02D2624:177b-13: sngon bsags chung nas rtsol ba zhan na ni mtha' mar mthong ste /
T02D2624:177b-14: mngon sum ni dbang po'i dngos su ni /
T02D2624:177b-17: yid kyis ji ltar bsgoms pa de ltar mthong ba'o //
T02D2624:177b-19: gnas ni gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2624:177b-20: 'byor lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin shes rab kyis cha snyoms pa ni mthong ba'o //
T02D2624:177b-21: mchod yon gsang la sogs pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:177b-23: yon ni bla re la sogs pa rnams /
T02D2624:177b-24: mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'phags pa mchod /
T02D2624:177b-25: rtags ni rgyu dang rkyen sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rtags so //
T02D2624:177b-26: gsang ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lha mor byin
T02D2624:177b-27: gyis brlabs pas thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir gsang
T02D2624:177b-28: / sogs ni thams cad 'tshogs pa la bya /
T02D2624:177b-29: dbyangs snyan pa'i bstod pa dang /
T02D2624:177b-30: lha rdzas kyi zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:177b-31: dbyangs ni rgyu dang ngag gi glu len pa la bya'o //
T02D2624:177b-32: snyan pa ni rnar snyan la /
T02D2624:177b-33: ba stong pa ni yon tan gyi sgo bstod de /
T02D2624:177b-34: lha rdzas mchod pa'i khyad par la bya bas /
T02D2624:177b-35: dngos grub mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa mchod /
T02D2624:177b-36: slob dpon zhugs pa'i yon tan mtshan ma mthong ba'i rtags dang /
T02D2624:177b-37: mchod pa dang bcas pa ba stan zin to //
T02D2624:177b-39: mchod pa'i spyin pa la bab ste /
T02D2624:177b-41: de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:177b-42: de nas ni skabs kyi rting thogs so //
T02D2624:177b-43: 'byung po ni dge ba'i tshogs la 'byung ba'i phyir na 'byung po ste /
T02D2624:178a-2: las kyi bag chags mi dge ba'i mthu las 'byung bas 'byung po ste /
T02D2624:178a-3: sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song ba'o //
T02D2624:178a-4: kun gyi ni ma lus pa'i phyir te mandala du bkod pa rnams so //
T02D2624:178a-5: gtor ma ni phrin las te khyab par byed pa ste /
T02D2624:178a-6: ma ni len par byed pa ste mi dmigs par gtong ba'o //
T02D2624:178a-7: da ni slob ma 'jug pa ston te /
T02D2624:178a-9: de nas sngags pa bla med byang chub kyi //
T02D2624:178a-11: sngags pa ni slob dpon te /
T02D2624:178a-12: ting nge 'dzin sngags kyi mthu dpal skye bas sngags pa'o //
T02D2624:178a-13: bla med ni rgyu bla na med pa'i sgo nas ni zhugs /
T02D2624:178a-14: 'bras bu bla na med pa thob pa'o //
T02D2624:178a-15: byang chub ni zad pa dang /
T02D2624:178a-17: slob ma de la zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:178a-19: gnas su slob ma yongs su smin par bya zhes gsungs so //
T02D2624:178a-20: mtshon pa'i gnas ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2624:178a-21: rgyu'i gnas ni slob ma'i sems so //
T02D2624:178a-22: yongs su smin par bya ba ni 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2624:178a-23: sems ma grol ba grol bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2624:178a-25: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2624:178a-26: mandala slob dpon la yon 'bul lo //
T02D2624:178a-27: rig pa'i me tog lha la 'phangs pa'o //
T02D2624:178a-28: gang la bab pa'i lha de la ba stan pa dang /
T02D2624:178a-30: da ni slob ma la dam tshig dbog pa ston te /
T02D2624:178a-32: de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis //
T02D2624:178a-34: de nas skabs kyi rting thogs so //
T02D2624:178a-35: sngags pa ni slob dpon no //
T02D2624:178a-36: mkhas pa ni dam tshig sgrogs pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2624:178a-37: slob dpon gyis aargha byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2624:178a-38: slob ma la dam tshig bsgrags pa'i tshigs bcad dang /
T02D2624:178a-39: sngags dang skyon yon ni bde ste ma bris so //
T02D2624:178a-40: da ni dam tshig dbog ste /
T02D2624:178a-42: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02D2624:178a-44: mdor na yid gnyis som nyi mi bya ste //
T02D2624:178a-45: zhes pa'i bar ni snying rje rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:178a-47: chags pas khams gsum du 'khor bar ma byin par mi blang ba dang /
T02D2624:178a-48: dam pa'i chos dang mi mthun pa'i brdzun mi smra ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-0: chags pas ting nge 'dzin @178b nyams pa'i gzhi yin
T02D2624:178b-1: pas bud med la chags pa mi skyed pa dang
T02D2624:178b-2: / nyes pa'i gzhi yin pas chang mi 'thung ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-3: 'byung po'i kha zas sha mi za ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-4: bsam pa ngan pa'i sbyor ba sems la mi bya ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-5: dmigs pa'i rten dkon mchog gsum mi spang ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-6: byang chub kyi sems rjes su gzung ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-7: lha'i snying po rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2624:178b-8: phyag rgya rnams rtag tu bya ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-9: lha dang slob dpon dbyer med par blta ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-10: slob dpon gyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing /
T02D2624:178b-11: lha la phul ba la mi 'gong ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-12: sngags dang phyag rgyal mi smad cing dang du blang ba dang ;
T02D2624:178b-13: grong sngags kyi las mi bya ba dang /
T02D2624:178b-14: yid gnyis dang som nyi mi bya'o //
T02D2624:178b-15: da ni mi 'da' ba'i thabs ba stan cing dbang bskur ba ston to /
T02D2624:178b-17: bdag gi de bzhin dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin pa ni /
T02D2624:178b-18: bdag sgrub pa po slob dpon no //
T02D2624:178b-19: de nyid ni slob ma nyid la bya la /
T02D2624:178b-20: sngags rig pa la sogs pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga dang /
T02D2624:178b-23: mos pa ni slob ma yid ches ltar bsgoms pas
T02D2624:178b-24: de bzhin du slob ma yang sgom du gzhug pa'o
T02D2624:178b-25: // rnam gcig tu ni bdag ni slob ma nyid /
T02D2624:178b-26: lha sngags ni lha'i snying po'o //
T02D2624:178b-27: sogs ni phyag rgya la sogs pa /
T02D2624:178b-28: de bzhin slob ma de sgom du gzhug pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:178b-29: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2624:178b-30: mos pa brtan dang ldan pa dam bcas nas //
T02D2624:178b-32: mos pa ni slob ma yid ches pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2624:178b-33: brtan pa ni sems mi 'gyur zhing 'khu ldog med pa'o //
T02D2624:178b-34: ldan pa ni yon tan tshang ba'i phyir smos la /
T02D2624:178b-35: dam bca' ba ni mi 'da' zhing //
T02D2624:178b-36: mi 'gyur bar dam bsgrags nas dbang bskur ba'i don to //
T02D2624:178b-38: bdag gi de bzhin dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin nyid //
T02D2624:178b-40: sarba ni thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams so //
T02D2624:178b-41: bid ni rig pa ste thugs so //
T02D2624:178b-42: ji bzhin ni slob ma ste /
T02D2624:178b-43: lha ji bzhin du dam bca' ba'o //
T02D2624:178b-44: dbang ni thugs te yo ga'i dbang bcu dang /
T02D2624:178b-45: thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang dang /
T02D2624:178b-46: rin po che sna bdun gyi dbang dang gsum mo //
T02D2624:178b-47: bskur ni slob ma la spyin ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:179a-1: sogs ji snyed mang thogs la //
T02D2624:179a-2: bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur //
T02D2624:179a-4: slob dpon gyis bum ba thugs kyi ngo bo sarba bid kyi byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2624:179a-5: bdud rtsi bum pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2624:179a-6: byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi sprul ba 'byung bas slob ma la dbang bskur bas /
T02D2624:179a-7: nyon mongs pa lnga 'joms pas rigs rnam pa lnga'i dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-8: thabs mkhas pa thugs rje'i phreng ba'i dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-9: byang chub sems dpa' cod pan gyi dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-10: mi 'da' ba phyag rgya'i dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-11: rgyal ba'i sras yin pas ming gi dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las mdzad pas las kyi dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-13: 'khor ba gting nas 'joms pas 'khor lo'i dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-14: gnyis su med pa gzungs kyi dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-15: chos nyid kyi don mthong bas gsang ba'i dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-16: rgyal ba'i sras yin pas ming gi dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bcu ni slob ma ji ltar dga' bar dbang rim pas bskur ro //
T02D2624:179a-18: da ni thabs shes rab kyi dbang bskur te /
T02D2624:179a-19: de nas lag tu rdo rje dang dril bu spyin /
T02D2624:179a-20: thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje thabs kyi dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-21: chos kyi dbyings skye ba med pa'i dril bu shes rab kyi dbang dang /
T02D2624:179a-22: gnyis ni mtha' gnyis dbang bskur bas thabs dang shes rab bo //
T02D2624:179a-23: da ni sa dang po thob pa'i las rin po che sna bdun gyi dbang bskur te /
T02D2624:179a-25: 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la /
T02D2624:179a-26: mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang ;
T02D2624:179a-27: sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02D2624:179a-29: 'khor lo ni gtso bo yin pas sna la smos so //
T02D2624:179a-30: sogs kyi khungs su rin po che sna bdun 'byung ste /
T02D2624:179a-31: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang spyar te /
T02D2624:179a-32: chos rnam par 'byed pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2624:179a-33: rang bzhin ni yan lag go //
T02D2624:179a-34: de'i rtags ni yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis 'khor ba 'joms pas na 'khor lo'o //
T02D2624:179a-36: btang snyoms ni mthong bas na spang bar bya ba'i
T02D2624:179a-37: ting nge 'dzin spangs nas nyon mongs pa rgyun du
T02D2624:179a-38: mi 'byung bas / nyon mongs pa med pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D2624:179b-0: de'i rtags ni @179b thabs thugs rjes nor bu rin po che'o //
T02D2624:179b-1: shin tu sbyangs pa ni lus sems las su rung ba ste /
T02D2624:179b-2: 'dod chags la sogs pa mi 'byung bas de'i rtags ni yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi btsun mo'o //
T02D2624:179b-3: brtson 'grus ni nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag ste /
T02D2624:179b-4: so so'i gnas las nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag ste /
T02D2624:179b-5: de'i rtags ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rta rin po che'o //
T02D2624:179b-6: ting nge 'dzin ni mthong pas spang bar bya ba'i
T02D2624:179b-7: nyon mongs pa spong bas gnas kyi yan lag go
T02D2624:179b-8: // de'i rtags ni thabs mkhas pa'i glang po rin po che'o //
T02D2624:179b-9: dga' ba'i phan yon gyi yan lag ste /
T02D2624:179b-10: sa dang bor bden pa mthong bas des lus sems
T02D2624:179b-11: las su rung bas phan 'dogs pas na de'i rtags
T02D2624:179b-12: ni 'khor ba'i dgra 'joms pa dmag mi rin po
T02D2624:179b-13: che'o // dran pa ni shes rab kyi rgyu ste /
T02D2624:179b-14: gnas kyi yan lag yin pas de'i rtags ni dran pa dang ldan pa'i khyim bdag rin po che'o //
T02D2624:179b-15: mi dbang ni 'jigs pas mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:179b-16: dbang ni sa dang po thob cing de la longs spyod pas phyug go //
T02D2624:179b-17: sdig pa ni bag chags la /
T02D2624:179b-18: gzhom pa ni sprul pa'i sku 'phro 'du bstims la /
T02D2624:179b-19: dbang ni byin gyis brlabs la byin pa'o //
T02D2624:179b-20: da ni slob ma dga' ba'i gtang rag yon 'bul ba ba stan te /
T02D2624:179b-22: sngags 'grub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la //
T02D2624:179b-24: sngags ni nyon mongs pa bcom nas dbang thob pa'o //
T02D2624:179b-25: grub pa ni chud ma zos par ro //
T02D2624:179b-26: phyir ni yon 'bul ba'i phyir na /
T02D2624:179b-29: slob ma ni dbang bskur ba ste /
T02D2624:179b-30: des slob dpon gyi dag mnyan nas gzhung las byung ba bzhin yon 'bul pa'o //
T02D2624:179b-31: dbang bskur ba'i yon tan yang bde ste ma smos so //
T02D2624:179b-32: da ni slob dpon gyi blta thabs ston te /
T02D2624:179b-34: sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam //

T02D2624:183a-35: chos kyi dbyings mtshon par byed pas hom khung dang /
