T02D2624:183a-37: ting nge 'dzin las sprul pa gzhan la 'byung ba mtshon pa'i thabs mchod pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D2624:183a-39: mi shis pa dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir na /
T02D2624:183a-40: tshon rtsi rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2624:183a-41: de med na'ang lcags rnam pa lnga'am /
T02D2624:183a-42: tha ma ni 'bras bu tshon gyis kha dog bsgyur ro //
T02D2624:183b-0: nyon mongs pa rnam pa lnga gzhom pa'i thugs sarba ping @183b kyis byin gyis brlab pa ston to //
T02D2624:183b-2: khru bzhi ba yi tshad du ni //
T02D2624:183b-5: ye shes rnam pa bzhis skye rgas na 'chi'i sdug
T02D2624:183b-6: bsngal sbyangs pa'i phyir na gru bzhi pa'o tshad du
T02D2624:183b-8: thab khung sogs gcig gi tshad ni khru bzhi ste /
T02D2624:183b-9: phyi'i tshad ni khru bcu gnyis te /
T02D2624:183b-10: rten 'brel bcu gnyis 'khor ba lugs las bzlog pa'i don te /
T02D2624:183b-12: kha gsum bcad pa'i dbus ma thab khung ste /
T02D2624:183b-13: gru bzhi zhes smos pa'i don to //
T02D2624:183b-14: de'i tshad phyi ma'i 'og mas ston te /
T02D2624:183b-16: cho ga bzhin du khung brkos //
T02D2624:183b-19: cho ga ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2624:183b-21: phyi rol gyi rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2624:183b-22: de la nang gi zabs ni /
T02D2624:183b-25: khru gang gi yar gyed de'i phyi rol smos so //
T02D2624:183b-26: thab khung la sor brgyang ni 'chad pa la mu ran du bya /
T02D2624:183b-27: me ri ni dmar por btang ste /
T02D2624:183b-28: rnam par thar ba brgyang kyi ye shes zhal gdangs pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:183b-29: phyi rol gyi snam bu'i nang du yang kha bzhir bcad de /
T02D2624:183b-30: phrin las rnam bzhi'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i rtags te /
T02D2624:183b-31: bzhi'i nang ma gsum du kha bcad de /
T02D2624:183b-32: gcig la rdo rje ba btang ste /
T02D2624:183b-33: kha khyer gcig la sems dpa' bcu drug / gcig
T02D2624:183b-34: la bskal bzang rgyal sras bcu drug / gru chad
T02D2624:183b-35: kyi nang gnyis la mchod pa'i lha mo brgyang /
T02D2624:183b-36: bzhi cha gcig la mchod pa rnams dang /
T02D2624:183b-39: sgo bzhi mu khyud dang bcas pa'i sa bcad do //
T02D2624:183b-40: de'i sum cha gcig phyir bcad do //
T02D2624:183b-41: shing rnams gzhag / bzhi'i cha thab lhag kha gnyis su 'chad de /
T02D2624:183b-42: gong ma'i sum cha la phyed po de yar bsnan la /
T02D2624:183b-43: shing gi snam bu la gzhag //
T02D2624:183b-44: phyed po de sum cha sum gnyis su btang la /
T02D2624:183b-46: nye ba'i sum cha gcig / mchod snam sum gnyis /
T02D2624:183b-47: 'jig rten ba'i snam bu bzhi cha phyed ni kha gnyis su btang ste /
T02D2624:183b-48: gza' dang rgyu skar gyi snam bu'o //
T02D2624:183b-49: phyi ma sgo sna ma mo //
T02D2624:183b-50: dbus kyi thab khung thig bzhi btab pa'i re'u mig dgur byas la /
T02D2624:184a-0: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'khor lo 'joms ba la 'bur du @184a * //
T02D2624:184a-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snam bu gnyis ni sems
T02D2624:184a-3: dpa' bskal bzang shing snam bar du bcug pa ni
T02D2624:184a-4: / 'jig rten pa phrag dog che ba'i phyir ram /
T02D2624:184a-5: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ngo shes
T02D2624:184a-6: pa'i phyir gzhag /'jig rten pa'i snam bu gnyis ni
T02D2624:184a-7: ; bar ma phyogs skyong bcu dang bkra shis brgyang /
T02D2624:184a-8: tha ma gtsug lag khang gi srung ma dang /
T02D2624:184a-11: de rnams bri ba'i dgos ched ni /
T02D2624:184a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' srung dang /
T02D2624:184a-13: rang gi 'khor gyi gdug pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2624:184a-14: 'jig rten pa'i mngon rtogs ston pa'i phyir bri /
T02D2624:184a-15: da ni mchod pa'i rgyan chas ston te /
T02D2624:184a-17: bya dang bum pa gang ba gzhag / ces pa dang /
T02D2624:184a-18: khung bu'i dbus su gzhag bar bya //
T02D2624:184a-20: 'khor ba'i nye gnas la phan 'dogs pa'i rtags dngul gyi bya po bcu drug dang ;
T02D2624:184a-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rtags gser gyi bum pa lnga dang /
T02D2624:184a-22: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'i rtags gtor ma dang /
T02D2624:184a-23: khams gsum tshim par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2624:184a-24: bza' ba dang bca' sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2624:184a-25: byang chub kyi yan lag lam tog sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2624:184a-26: thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2624:184a-27: khams gsum gyi bla mar gyur pas bla re dang /
T02D2624:184a-28: nyon mongs pa'i bdud las rgyal ba'i rtags rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2624:184a-29: ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rtags dar sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2624:184a-30: nyon mongs pa'i tsha bas gdung ba las bsil ba'i gdugs dang /
T02D2624:184a-31: ting nge 'dzin la shes pa rtsal sbyong ba dang /
T02D2624:184a-32: dam rdzas dang ldan par bya ba ste /
T02D2624:184a-33: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D2624:184a-34: ye shes kyi 'od zer dmigs nas bsreg rdzas dang /
T02D2624:184a-35: mchod rdzas la sogs pa kun ni /
T02D2624:184a-36: 'phags pa mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D2624:184a-37: dngos grub thob pa'i rtags su khung bu'i dbus su
T02D2624:184a-38: gzhag / da ni ro byin gyis brlab cing rgyas
T02D2624:184a-41: ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
T02D2624:184a-42: chu mchog gis ni bkru bar bya //
T02D2624:184a-44: ro ni rgyu 'bras kyi tshul gong du smos pa'o //
T02D2624:184a-45: sngags ni rigs rnam pa lnga'i sku bskyed pa dang /
T02D2624:184b-1: nye ba'i snying po dang lnga ste bco lnga'o //
T02D2624:184b-3: rdo rje bsgom pa gnyis te bcu bcun no //
T02D2624:184b-5: phyi'i btab pa ni lus la btab pa dang /
T02D2624:184b-6: nang gi btab pa ni yig 'bru ste /
T02D2624:184b-7: de rnams sprul pa rol ba stims nas dngos po med par bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:184b-8: chu ni bum pa'i nang gi chu ste /
T02D2624:184b-9: dri zhim po la sogs pa gzhung nas 'byung ba rnams spyar ro //
T02D2624:184b-10: mchog ni snying po bcu bdun gyis byang chub sems zla ba'i mandala du gyur par bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:184b-11: bkru bar bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2624:184b-12: phyi'i bkru ba bum pa'i chus 'khru ba dang /
T02D2624:184b-13: nang gi bkrus ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'dus dag par byed pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:184b-14: bzlas pa dri yis byug par bya //
T02D2624:184b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi bzlas pa dang /
T02D2624:184b-18: dri gur gum la sogs pas lus la byug pa dang /
T02D2624:184b-19: tshul khrims kyi dris byin gyis brlabs pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:184b-20: gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang //
T02D2624:184b-22: gos ni sngags mkhan gyi chas gos dang /
T02D2624:184b-23: ro'i gos ni phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i las gang byed pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2624:184b-24: rgyan ni sku bre'u ldir gyi cod ban gyi rgyan la sogs pa btags pa dang ;
T02D2624:184b-25: klu bas ni mang ba dang mdzes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:184b-26: da ni rol sngags kyis byin gyis brlab cing gdags pa'i don te /
T02D2624:184b-28: sngags bris pa ni gdags par bya //
T02D2624:184b-30: sngags ni lha so so'i yig 'bru'o //
T02D2624:184b-31: bris pa'i ni grogs 'am shog shog la bri'o //
T02D2624:184b-32: gdags pa ni lus la gdags pa'o //
T02D2624:184b-33: de'i gnas gnag yin zhe na /
T02D2624:184b-34: snying ga lkog ma kha phyogs dang //
T02D2624:184b-35: dpral ba mdzod sbu rna ba gnyis //
T02D2624:184b-36: mgo bo gtsug phud dpung pa gnyis //
T02D2624:184b-37: sna dang rked pa pus mo phol //
T02D2624:184b-38: long bu sna yi rtse mo dang //
T02D2624:184b-39: mi gnyis dang ni gsang ba'i gnas //
T02D2624:184b-40: dbang po rnams kyi gnas dag tu //
T02D2624:184b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis /
T02D2624:184b-43: mtshan ma rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2624:184b-44: de'i gnas ni bcu bdun yod de /
T02D2624:184b-46: de las byung ba lnga ste /
T02D2624:185a-0: de rnams ni thugs kyi ngo bor spyar @185a * //
T02D2624:185a-2: de mtshon ba'i gnas ni lus te /
T02D2624:185a-4: sngon gyi bag chags kyis bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin pas sems rten pa'i gzhi byed bas /
T02D2624:185a-5: lus thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni mgo po ste /
T02D2624:185a-6: de bzhin du ma rig pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2624:185a-8: ma rig pa mi shes pa'i dbang gis de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D2624:185a-10: rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo rmongs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:185a-12: rin che me tog gi nye ba'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:185a-14: de mgo la gdags shing byin gyis brlabs pa tshul bzhin bya'o //
T02D2624:185a-15: dpung pa ni las kyi 'du byed la rtsol bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pas na /
T02D2624:185a-16: dpe de dang 'dra bar ma rig pa mgo rmongs pas na /
T02D2624:185a-17: phyi'i yul rnams la 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon
T02D2624:185a-18: mongs ba skye ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i
T02D2624:185a-20: de sbyong [*spyod?] ba'i phyir sh'akya thub pa'i nye ba'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:185a-21: aom sarba bid aa: dpung pa la gdags te gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab pa'i don to //
T02D2624:185a-22: snying ni khyad par du yang shes pa'i rang bzhin gnas pa'i yin te /
T02D2624:185a-23: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni /
T02D2624:185a-24: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis so so'i sprul pa rnam par rig cing ma 'dres par mchod pa dang /
T02D2624:185a-26: de 'joms pa'i phrag rgyan ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis nying po ste /
T02D2624:185a-27: aom sho dha ni sho dha ni sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ni /
T02D2624:185a-28: shuddhe bi shddhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'ah'a /
T02D2624:185a-29: snying gar btags nas byin gyis brlab pa'i don to //
T02D2624:185a-30: rkyen pa ni dang po phung po skye ba'i rgyu
T02D2624:185a-31: byed pa'i rten lte ba'i thad ka nas ma zos
T02D2624:185a-32: pa'i drod kyis reg pas 'tsho bar bye dpas na
T02D2624:185a-34: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la
T02D2624:185a-35: las kyi bcag zhags bsgos shing smon pas lhan cig
T02D2624:185a-36: skyes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po ni ming
T02D2624:185a-38: de 'joms pa'i phyag rgya ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku bskyed pa'i sa bon te /
T02D2624:185a-40: rked par byin gyis brlab cing gdags pa'i don to //
T02D2624:185a-41: rna ba'i dbang po gro ga gcus te bcad pa
T02D2624:185b-0: 'dra ba ni rnam @185b par shes pa skye zhing
T02D2624:185b-2: dper na rgyu ming dang gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug ste /
T02D2624:185b-4: kun rig gi nye ba'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:185b-5: aom sarba bid sarba a'a bar na bi sho dha ya ha na h'um phat /
T02D2624:185b-6: rna ba gnyis la gdags shing gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab pa'i don to //
T02D2624:185b-7: sna'i dbang po zangs ma'i mo khab gshibs pa dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D2624:185b-8: yul la brten nas rnam par shes pa byung nas yul nyams su myong ba'i don te /
T02D2624:185b-9: de bzhin du yul dang dbang po dang /
T02D2624:185b-10: rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus nas /
T02D2624:185b-11: nyams su myangs nas phrad pa ni reg pa'o //
T02D2624:185b-12: de 'joms pa ni me tog cher rgyas kyi nye ba'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:185b-14: sna la btags la byin gyis brlabs nas gnyis su med par bya ba'i don to //
T02D2624:185b-15: dpral ba'i ngo bo ni bkrag mdangs 'byung pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhi ste /
T02D2624:185b-16: de bzhin du reg pas yul dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe /
T02D2624:185b-17: tsher bas yul gyi bde sdug nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba ste /
T02D2624:185b-19: me tog cher rgyas kyi snying pos te /
T02D2624:185b-21: dpral bar btags nas byin gyis brlab pa'i don to //
T02D2624:185b-22: kha ni zas la sogs pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu byed pas na /
T02D2624:185b-23: de bzhin du tshor bas yul gyi bde sdug nyams
T02D2624:185b-24: su myong nas phung po lnga la mngon par zhen
T02D2624:185b-26: de 'joms pa'i phyag rgya ni sh'akya thub pa'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:185b-27: aom sarba aa pa ya bi sho dha ya h'um phat /
T02D2624:185b-28: sh'akya thub pa'i snying po snying gar btags la byin gyis brlab pa'i don to //
T02D2624:185b-29: pus mo ni brkyang ba dang /
T02D2624:185b-32: de bzhin du sred pas yum gyi rnam par shes
T02D2624:185b-33: pa la shes pa la 'phel zhing 'byung ba'i rkyen
T02D2624:185b-35: me tog thu ba lta bu ste /
T02D2624:185b-36: yul la bdag tu zhen pa'i don to //
T02D2624:185b-37: de 'joms pa ni ngan song sbyong ba'i sku bskyed pa'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:185b-38: aom sarba bid sva' bus mo gnyis la gtags la
T02D2624:185b-39: gnyis su med pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don to
T02D2624:185b-40: // rkang ba'i bol ni phung po 'dren cing mgyogs par byed pa'i gzhi byed pa ste /
T02D2624:186a-0: de bzhin du yul la len pas bdag tu gzung bas las kyis ma'i @186a * //
T02D2624:186a-2: srid pa'i gzhi bsgrub pa'i sa bon 'byin pas srid pa'o //
T02D2624:186a-3: de 'joms pa ni rin chen me tog gi sku bskyed pa'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:186a-5: rkang pa'i bol gnyis la btags nas gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab pa'i don to //
T02D2624:186a-6: gsang ba'i gnas ni sems can skye ba'i rgyu sa bon 'byung ba'i gnas te /
T02D2624:186a-7: de bzhin du srid pas srid cing rtas par byed
T02D2624:186a-8: pas phung po smin cing ma'i mngal nas byung nas
T02D2624:186a-10: de 'joms pa ni rdo rje'i bsgom pa ste /
T02D2624:186a-11: aom bha gsang ba'i gnas su gdags te /

T02D2624:186a-13: gtsug phud ni rgas pa'i rtags te /
T02D2624:186a-15: skra dkar por gyur pa'i rtags so //
T02D2624:186a-16: de bzhin du sems can rnams las kyis rab tu bskyed nas /
T02D2624:186a-17: phung po smin cing mthar thug pa'i rgas pa ste de bdag po'o //
T02D2624:186a-18: de 'joms pa ni me tog cher rgyas kyi sku bskyed pa'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:186a-20: gtsug phud du btags te gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2624:186a-21: lkog ma ni dbugs phyi nang gnyis su rgyu ba'i
T02D2624:186a-22: rten srog gi gzungs yin pas de bzhin du dang
T02D2624:186a-23: po skye ba'i skye ba'i rkyen gyis rgas nas khams
T02D2624:186a-25: nad kyi rnam pa sna tshogs phung po rnam par

T02D2624:186a-29: rin chen me tog gi snying po ste /
T02D2624:186a-30: aom sho dha ni sho dha ni sarba aa pa yan sarba sva rgye bhya h'um /
T02D2624:186a-31: rin chen me tog gi snying po ste /
T02D2624:186a-32: klog mar btags la byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2624:186a-34: rkang pa'i tshigs gnas pa'i gzhi ste /
T02D2624:186a-35: de bzhin du rab tu 'ching bar myos te /
T02D2624:186a-36: sems can mngon par chags pa dang bcas te /
T02D2624:186a-37: gang gis sems rab tu gdung ba'i mya ngan no //
T02D2624:186a-38: de 'joms pa'i phyag rgya ni sh'akya thub pa'i sku bskyed pa ste /
T02D2624:186a-40: long bu la btags la gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab /
T02D2624:186a-41: mig ni yul sna tshogs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mig gi dbang po chu dang ba lta bu ste /
T02D2624:186a-42: de bzhin du mya ngan gyi sems rab tu gdungs te shin tu myos te /
T02D2624:186b-0: tshig @186b rnam pa sna tshogs su smre sngags 'don
T02D2624:186b-1: pa ni smre sngags 'joms pa'i phyag rgya ni stong
T02D2624:186b-2: par byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags te /
T02D2624:186b-3: aom sha mig la btags la byin gyis brlab bo //

T02D2624:186b-7: lhan cig tu sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ste rab tu nyon mongs pas gzir ba ni /
T02D2624:186b-8: sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyud kyi rgyu ste /

T02D2624:186b-10: ngan song sbyong ba'i nye ba'i snying po ste /

T02D2624:186b-14: sna ni rnam par shes pa skye ba'i rgyu byed de /
T02D2624:186b-15: dpe de dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal gyis sems gzir cing nyon mongs pa'i tshe /
T02D2624:186b-16: yid mi bde ba'i 'khrul pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur nas /
T02D2624:186b-17: nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs pas /

T02D2624:186b-25: sems can phyi gzung ba'i yul med pa la /

T02D2624:186b-27: stong par bsgom pa smos la /
T02D2624:186b-28: nang 'dzin pa'i sems med pa la bdag tu lta
T02D2624:186b-29: ba'i gnyen por ni rdo rje bsgom pa smos so
T02D2624:186b-30: // phyi la bco lnga yod ba ni rnam pa gsum du bsdus te /

T02D2624:196b-26: phyin pa ni skyo dub med pa'i mtshan nyid do
T02D2624:196b-27: // ko la pa ti ni khyod kyi smon lam
T02D2624:196b-28: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthun pa'i ye
T02D2624:196b-29: shes la dmigs pa'i don to //
T02D2624:196b-30: ko la ta tha ainti ni khyod ni bsam gtan
T02D2624:196b-31: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mthong ba'i chos
T02D2624:196b-32: nyid bsam du med pa la gtan 'cha' ba'i phyir
T02D2624:196b-33: ro // thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2624:196b-34: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni mgon po rgyal mtshan gyi dpung rgyan can no //
T02D2624:196b-35: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni glang po'i rna ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2624:196b-36: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ni rnam par gnon pa'i ngo bo brnyes se ;
T02D2624:196b-37: / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni yon tan rin chen 'byung ldan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2624:196b-38: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni bden pa'i don ston pa thob pa'o //
T02D2624:196b-39: spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ni gzugs mdzes pa thob bo //
T02D2624:197a-0: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni yid kyis brgyan pa @197a * //
T02D2624:197a-2: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni me 'bar ba can 'grub po //
T02D2624:197a-3: bsam gtan gyis ni gzugs mdzes pa yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2624:197a-4: gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad du gsol //
T02D2624:197a-5: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02D2624:197a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas bshad du
T02D2624:197a-7: gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis ni bka' ngang ba ba
T02D2624:197a-8: stan to // da ni dkyil 'khor gyi yig 'bru'i don te /
T02D2624:197a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:197a-10: ngang nas tshe dpag med kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i phyir na smos so //
T02D2624:197a-11: thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes pa ni thams cad ni dngos por snang ba'o //
T02D2624:197a-12: tshe ni ye shes kyi dngos po med par rtogs pas na dpag med do //
T02D2624:197a-13: khyad par du 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:197a-14: dbyings khyab pa'i rang bzhin las ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir na rdo rje zhes smos so //
T02D2624:197a-15: phyi ma ni bde ste ma smos so //
T02D2624:197a-16: thugs chos kyi yi ge nyid du zhugs par gyur
T02D2624:197a-17: pa ni thugs ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin la
T02D2624:197a-18: / chos ni mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du phrin las mdzad pa'i don to //
T02D2624:197a-20: tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje'i 'od byed pa ni /
T02D2624:197a-21: yang dag pa'i ye shes dngos po dang bral bas ni dpag tu med la ;
T02D2624:197a-22: rdo rje ltar 'dus ma byas pas ni thugs rje'i 'od byed /
T02D2624:197a-23: gdon mi za ba'i sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa
T02D2624:197a-24: ni zhes pa la gdon mi za ni phrin las
T02D2624:197a-26: sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa'o //
T02D2624:197a-27: 'joms pa ni mtshan ma thams cad 'joms pa'o //
T02D2624:197a-28: dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje ni /
T02D2624:197a-29: dri ma ni gzung 'dzin gyi bag chags so //
T02D2624:197a-31: rdo rje ni chos nyid du bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:197a-32: gdon mi za bar mi choms [*tshoms?] pa //
T02D2624:197a-34: thugs rje dang phrin las gzhan gyis mi choms [*tshoms?] pa'o //
T02D2624:197a-35: de rnams ni rigs lnga'i snying po ste ci rigs par spyar /
T02D2624:197a-36: sngags kyi yig 'bru'i don bsdus pa bshad zin to /
T02D2624:197a-38: // / da ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i thabs ston te /
T02D2624:197a-40: grub zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2624:197a-41: sgo ba rnams dang ldan pa ste //
T02D2624:197a-42: rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya //
T02D2624:197a-43: lte ba dang ni mu khyud ldan //
T02D2624:197b-0: grub bzhi ni phrin las @197b rnam pa bzhis 'gro
T02D2624:197b-1: ba'i don byed pa'i rtags yin pas grub zhir ldan
T02D2624:197b-2: no // sgo bzhi ni tshad med pa'i phrin las
T02D2624:197b-3: rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba la dbyung ba'i sgo dang
T02D2624:197b-4: no // / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis theg pa chen po la 'dzud cing 'god pa'i rtags so //
T02D2624:197b-5: sgo ba ni de'i phyag rgya ste ye shes kyi 'od dang ldan par bri'o //
T02D2624:197b-6: rta babs bzhi ni sgo bzhi bang rim gyi them pa bzhi ste /
T02D2624:197b-7: snying rje la sogs pa tshad med pa bzhi'i rtags so //
T02D2624:197b-8: lte ba ni dbus kyi pho brang zlum po ste chos nyid kyi rtags so //
T02D2624:197b-12: dbus ni dkyil 'khor gyi sum gnyis la bya'o //
T02D2624:197b-14: dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya //
T02D2624:197b-16: dkyil ni dbus kyi pho brang ste gtso bo'i sa bcad do //
T02D2624:197b-17: rtsibs bzhi pa dang ldan pa la //
T02D2624:197b-18: zhes pa ni rtsibs bzhi pa ni 'khor lo'i lce bzhi'o //
T02D2624:197b-19: de ni ye shes rnam pa bzhi'i phrin las so //
T02D2624:197b-20: lte ba dkyil 'khor ldan par bya //
T02D2624:197b-21: zhes pa ni lte ba ni dbus kyi pho brang zlum po la /
T02D2624:197b-22: dkyil ni de'i sa bcad do //
T02D2624:197b-23: 'khor lo ni rtsibs su ba stan to //
T02D2624:197b-24: ldan par bya ba ni lha bri ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:197b-26: de yid bus su gtso bo ni //
T02D2624:197b-27: zhes gsungs te de ni 'khor lo'o //
T02D2624:197b-29: gtso bo ni phyag na rdo rje sku mdog ljang
T02D2624:197b-30: skya zhal zla ba rgyas pa ltar 'dzum pa phyag
T02D2624:197b-32: g-yon pa na dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D2624:197b-33: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bri'o //
T02D2624:197b-34: shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni mgon po mi bskyod pa bri bar bya zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:197b-35: shar ni shar kyi phyogs so //
T02D2624:197b-37: mgon po ni khams gsum gyi mgon mdzad cing mtshan
T02D2624:197b-38: mas mi bskyod pas sku mdog dkar po sa gnon
T02D2624:197b-40: lho'i rtsibs la rin chen 'byung ldan mchog spyin gyi phyag rgya can bri'o //
T02D2624:197b-41: nub kyi rtsibs la snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog
T02D2624:197b-42: dmar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bri'o
T02D2624:197b-43: // byang gi rtsibs la gdon mi za bar grub
T02D2624:197b-44: pa sku mdog ljang gu skyabs spyin gyi phyag rgya
T02D2624:197b-45: // can bri'o // phyi ma ni gtsug tor brgyang dang cha mthun no //
T02D2624:197b-46: 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs su bri /
T02D2624:197b-47: mandala du bdag nyid zhugs shing lha spyan drang ba ni /
T02D2624:197b-48: de nas rnam grol can nyid dang //
T02D2624:198a-0: @198a * // sa ma ya h'um zhes pa'i bar gyis ba stan //
T02D2624:198a-1: rdo rje ti ri zhes pa nas badzra h'um zhes
T02D2624:198a-2: pa'i bar gyis ni rig pa'i me tog de mandala
T02D2624:198a-4: de nas zhes ba nas h'um zhes ba'i bar gyis ni dam tshig bsgrag pa ba stan /
T02D2624:198a-5: bar gyi tshigs gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor ba stan pa'o //
T02D2624:198a-6: de nas 'di zhes ba nas aa bhi shinytsa h'um
T02D2624:198a-7: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni dbang bskur ba ba stan
T02D2624:198a-8: / de nas zhes pa nas aa: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni tshe bsring ba'i thabs ba stan /
T02D2624:198a-9: de'i sgrub pa zhes pa nas bzlas brjod ces pa'i bar gyis ni /
T02D2624:198a-10: bsgrub pa'i lha bri ba ba stan /
T02D2624:198a-11: da ni sgrub pa po ston te de nas zla
T02D2624:198a-12: ba nya'i tshe mchod pa chen po byas la ba
T02D2624:198a-13: dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la zhes
T02D2624:198a-14: pa ni sgrub pa byed pa'i dus ni zla ba
T02D2624:198a-15: nya ba ste / tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i phyir dang //
T02D2624:198a-16: ting nge 'dzin rgyas pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2624:198a-17: 'jig rten pa dang mthun pa'i phyir smos so //
T02D2624:198a-18: phyi nang gi mchod pas mnyes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa la mchod pa phul la /
T02D2624:198a-19: bdag gis snod gtsang ma'i nang du ba dmar ser gyi mar dang /
T02D2624:198a-21: gur gum la sogs pa bsres shing bcug la /
T02D2624:198a-22: bdag nyid las kyi lha phyag na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la /
T02D2624:198a-23: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag
T02D2624:198a-24: rgya bcas la snod la gtad la g-yas pa thal
T02D2624:198a-25: mo khong stong du spyar te /
T02D2624:198a-26: bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med rab tu bsam zhing /
T02D2624:198a-27: sku'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs pa'i rten bcas nas bsnyen pa dang bzlas brjod tshul bzhin byas nas /
T02D2624:198a-28: dngos grub mtshan ma ma byung na yang /
T02D2624:198a-30: til mar ram 'o ma chang ngam khrag gam zhag
T02D2624:198a-31: gam glang ba'am sha'am gang yang rung ba la bzlas
T02D2624:198a-32: shing bdag nyid kyis bshags pa bya zhing /
T02D2624:198a-33: bdag nyid kyi lus gur gum gyi chu la bkrus
T02D2624:198a-34: la bsnyen pa yun ring du byas na 'grub par
T02D2624:198a-36: tshe dpag med las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i
T02D2624:198a-37: phyag na rdo rje'i 'di dkyil 'khor bshad zin to
T02D2624:198a-39: / // / da ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02D2624:198a-41: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis //
T02D2624:198a-43: de nas ni tshe dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor rting
T02D2624:198b-0: thogs su 'byung ba'i phyir na de nas zhes @198b
T02D2624:198b-1: bya'o // rgyal po ni rgya la po chen po bzhi lha'i rgyal pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2624:198b-2: chen po ni sku bzhi dang dpal brgyang bka' srung
T02D2624:198b-3: rigs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir phrin las mdzad pa'i phyir
T02D2624:198b-4: na chen po'o // bzhi ni yul 'khor srung dang /
T02D2624:198b-7: rnam thos sras la sogs pa bzhis bka' stsal du
T02D2624:198b-8: gsol bya ba'i bar gyis rang gi snying po 'gro
T02D2624:198b-9: ba la phan pa'i don du mdongs gsol du dbul
T02D2624:198b-10: bar gsol ba'o // de bzhin gshegs pas bka' ngang
T02D2624:198b-11: ba dang rgyal pos snying po phul ba ni bde
T02D2624:198b-13: da ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i don ba stan te /
T02D2624:198b-14: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes gsungs te /
T02D2624:198b-15: de nas ni snying po phul ba'i rting thogs so //
T02D2624:198b-16: dkyil ni phyag na rdo rje dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2624:198b-17: 'khor ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'o //
T02D2624:198b-18: bshad pa ni don bshad pa'o //
T02D2624:198b-20: grub zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2624:198b-21: dkyil 'khor ldas ni brgyan pa ste //
T02D2624:198b-23: gru bzhi ni rgyal po chen po bzhi yod pas gru bzhir bya'o //
T02D2624:198b-24: sgo bzhi ni rgyal po bzhis phyogs bzhi nas rigs
T02D2624:198b-25: kyis 'dul ba dang dam bca' ba'i phrin las mdzad
T02D2624:198b-27: dkyil 'khor ni phyag na rdo rje dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2624:198b-28: ldas brgyan zhes ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi
T02D2624:198b-29: dang lnga yod pa'i phyir na ldas brgyan te zhes
T02D2624:198b-30: smos so // de yang mandala gyi sum gnyis la tham ga bzhi btab pa'i re'u mig dgu la /
T02D2624:198b-31: dbus su phyag na rdo rje 'gying bag tu bri /
T02D2624:198b-32: re'u mig gi mtshams su rgyal po chen po bzhi'i btsun mo bri'o //
T02D2624:198b-33: yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo rdo rje mda' byed ma dang /
T02D2624:198b-34: 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dpe med ma dang //
T02D2624:198b-35: mig mi bzang gi btsun mo 'dul mkhas ma dang /
T02D2624:198b-36: rnam thos sras kyi btsun mo phreng 'dzin dang /
T02D2624:198b-37: re'u mig gi bar yang rin po che'i phreng bas bcad do //
T02D2624:198b-38: phyi rol yang zlum pos bskor /
T02D2624:198b-39: gru chad bzhi la dus bzhi bri'o //
T02D2624:198b-40: de'i phyi rol du mchod snam bcad /
T02D2624:198b-41: sgo bzhi yang phyogs su bri'o //
T02D2624:198b-42: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcas la slob ma gzhug / rig pa'i me tog dor /
T02D2624:198b-43: gang la bab pa'i rgyal pos dbang bskur /
T02D2624:198b-44: da ni dbang bskur ba ston te /
T02D2624:199a-0: de nas grva na gzhag ba @199a * //
T02D2624:199a-2: / bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te //
T02D2624:199a-4: de nas ni zhes pa ni mandala bri ba'i rting thogs so //
T02D2624:199a-5: mtshams zhes bya ba ni re'u mig gi mtshams su gzhag pa'o //
T02D2624:199a-6: bum pa bzhi rgyal po bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D2624:199a-7: de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la /
T02D2624:199a-8: dang po phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur /
T02D2624:199a-9: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bum pa phyogs
T02D2624:199a-10: phyogs na yod bas rim pas dbang bskur la byin
T02D2624:199a-11: gyis brlabs na yon tan gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin
T02D2624:199a-13: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bsdus pa bshad zin to /
T02D2624:199a-15: // / da ni phyogs skyod bcu'i dkyil 'khor bshad de /
T02D2624:199a-16: de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:199a-17: de nas ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rting thogs so //
T02D2624:199a-18: phyogs ni phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi dang brgyang steng 'og dang bcu'o //
T02D2624:199a-19: skyong ba ni de rnams kyis 'jig rten skyong ba'o ;
T02D2624:199a-20: / de rnams kyis ni 'khor rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'bul bar zhus pa dang /
T02D2624:199a-21: ngang ba dang snying po phul ba'o //
T02D2624:199a-22: da ni dkyil 'khor bri ba ston te /
T02D2624:199a-23: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:199a-24: de nas ni skabs kyi rting thogs so //
T02D2624:199a-25: de dag ni phyogs skyong pa'o //
T02D2624:199a-26: dkyil ni dbus su mgon po phyag na rdo rje bri'o //
T02D2624:199a-28: bshad pa ni don bshad pa'o //
T02D2624:199a-29: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:199a-30: snga ma ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'dra bar bri ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:199a-31: phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyang kyi re'u mig las dbus kyi
T02D2624:199a-32: re'u mig la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
T02D2624:199a-33: zhib sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yas pa rdo rje
T02D2624:199a-35: g-yon dril bu dku la brten pa bri'o //
T02D2624:199a-36: de'i mdun du nyi ma dmar po shing rta la zhon pa nyi ma 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199a-37: zla ba dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa zla ba 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199a-38: rgyab tu sa bdag phag mgo can pi wang 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199a-39: shar du brgya byin ser po glang po che la zhon pa rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199a-40: lhor gshin rje sngon po ma he la zhon pa dbyug to 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199a-41: nub tu chu lha dkar po chu srin la zhon ba sprul zhags 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199a-42: byang du gnod spyin ser po rta la zhon pa rin po che 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199b-0: byang shar du dbang ldan dkar po glang la zhon pa rtse @199b gsum 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199b-1: shar lhor me lha dmar po ra la zhon pa dbyug to 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199b-2: lho nub tu srin po nag po mi la zhon par ral gri 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199b-3: nub byang du rlung lha ljang gu sha ba la zhon pa bdag 'dzin pa /
T02D2624:199b-4: sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin du phyi ma ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dang mthun no //
T02D2624:199b-5: de nas spyan drang pa dang ;
T02D2624:199b-8: phyogs skyong ba bcu'i sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2624:199b-10: yon tan gyi che ba bsrung zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang /
T02D2624:199b-11: so so rang rang gi phyogs srung ba'i phyir dam bcas ba ni bde ste bshad mi dgos so //
T02D2624:199b-12: phyogs skyong ba bcu'i mandala 'dis ni gdon stong phrag
T02D2624:199b-13: brgyang cu rtsa bzhi zlog par bgyid pas phyogs skyong
T02D2624:199b-14: bcu'i dkyil 'khor gsungs te de ni 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2624:199b-15: gtso bo yin pas na 'jig rten pa la phan
T02D2624:199b-17: phyogs skyong bcu'i dkyil 'khor gyi don mdor bsdus pa bshad zin to //
T02D2624:199b-18: da ni gza' chen po brgyang kyi mandala bshad de /
T02D2624:199b-19: de ni sems can la gza' chen po brgyang gshed
T02D2624:199b-20: dang skar ma'i rlung rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2624:199b-21: gsungs te / de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2624:199b-22: de nas gza' chen po brgyang dang /
T02D2624:199b-23: 'khor rgyu skar dang bcas pa rnams kyis zhes gsungs te /
T02D2624:199b-24: de ni skabs kyi rting thogs su 'byung ba'o //
T02D2624:199b-26: gza' ni dper na 'jig rten pa dag sgra la
T02D2624:199b-27: gza' zhugs na mi rung par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
T02D2624:199b-28: te / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i gza' chen
T02D2624:199b-29: po brgyang ni 'jig rten na rgyu ba'i ma rungs
T02D2624:199b-30: pa ste bar snang la gnas shing gnod pa'i gdug
T02D2624:199b-31: rtsub byed pa'i phyir smos so //
T02D2624:199b-32: de'i 'khor ni rgyu skar te nam mkha' la rgyu zhing zla ba'i mngag gzhug dang /
T02D2624:199b-33: las kun byed pas na rgyu skar ro //
T02D2624:199b-34: de rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor yin pas
T02D2624:199b-35: 'jig rten pa'i gnod pa zhi par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2624:199b-36: smos so ; /'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2624:199b-37: 'og gi don 'di kho na bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba gsol ba'i phyir smos so //
T02D2624:199b-38: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud
T02D2624:199b-39: bcom zhing pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa'i yon
T02D2624:199b-40: tan dang ldan pas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral
T02D2624:200a-2: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa zhes pa ni bdag
T02D2624:200a-3: gi gza' chen po brgyang la pa sangs gtsor smos
T02D2624:200a-4: pa'o // gcig ni phur bu la sogs pa phyi ma bdun gyi tha tshig go //
T02D2624:200a-5: 'khor ni gza' re re dang rgyu skar rnams dus
T02D2624:200a-6: su rgyu bas na rgyu skar gyi 'khor du gsungs
T02D2624:200a-7: so // rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi zhes pa
T02D2624:200a-8: ni rang rang gza' dang rgyu skar nyid la bya
T02D2624:200a-10: gsang sngags ni rang rtags kyi snying po sems la gnas pa'i don to //
T02D2624:200a-11: byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:200a-12: dper na ras dkar po dmar por byin gyis brlab
T02D2624:200a-13: pa ni btsod la yod pa dang 'dra bar de
T02D2624:200a-14: bzhin du gza' dang rgyu skar gyi snying po byin
T02D2624:200a-15: gyis brlab pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
T02D2624:200a-17: byin gyis brlab pa bshad zin to //
T02D2624:200a-18: da ni snying po bshad ba ston te legs so
T02D2624:200a-19: dpa' zhes pa ni legs so ni gza' tshig la
T02D2624:200a-20: bcom ldan 'das mgu ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:200a-21: dpa' ni phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis ngang ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:200a-22: phyi ma ni bde ste bshad mi dgos so //
T02D2624:200a-23: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi don ston te /
T02D2624:200a-25: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:200a-26: de ni gong ma'i mjug sdud pa la /
T02D2624:200a-27: nas ni 'og gi dkyil 'khor gyi mgo 'dren pa la'o //
T02D2624:200a-28: de dag ni gza' dang rgyu skar de dag go //
T02D2624:200a-29: dkyil ni phyag na rdo rje dkyil na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2624:200a-30: 'khor ni gza' dang rgyu skar du bcas pa'o //
T02D2624:200a-31: bshad pa ni tshig dang don gsal bar bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:200a-32: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:200a-33: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam bar dag pa
T02D2624:200a-34: yin pa'i phyir ni 'jig / chad pa ma yin
T02D2624:200a-36: gsum ni 'dod khams dang gzugs khams dang /
T02D2624:200a-37: gzugs med pa'i khams gsum la bya'o //
T02D2624:200a-38: rnam par rgyal ba ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa ste
T02D2624:200a-39: de rnams las thugs rje'i phrin las kyi rgyal ba'i
T02D2624:200a-40: rtags te / de ni phyag na rdo rje ste
T02D2624:200a-41: gza'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su khro bor ston te
T02D2624:200a-42: rtags te / / h'um ka ra'i gzugs su bri ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:200a-43: ngos rnams su phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri zhes pa ni //
T02D2624:200a-44: ngos ni dkyil 'khor kha gsum du bcad ba de'i
T02D2624:200a-45: dbus thig bzhi btab pa'i re'u mig dgu pa rin
T02D2624:200b-0: po che'i phreng bas zlum por bskor @200b ba'i phyi
T02D2624:200b-1: rol gyi gru chad bzhi la bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2624:200b-2: go // phyag rgya bzhi ni dus bzhi'i lha mo
T02D2624:200b-3: bzhi phyag rgya bdug spos me tog mar me dri
T02D2624:200b-5: rnam pa gcig tu rdo rje rin po che /
T02D2624:200b-6: padma rgya gram zhes smos so //
T02D2624:200b-7: de yi mdun du pa ba sangs //
T02D2624:200b-8: zhes pa ni de ni h'um ka ra'o //
T02D2624:200b-9: mdun du ni shar phyogs kyi re'u mig go //
T02D2624:200b-10: pa ba sangs mdog dkar po lag na me tog ku mu ta dang shing tog bsnams pa /
T02D2624:200b-11: rgyab tu zla ba bri bar bya //
T02D2624:200b-12: zhes pa ni rgyab ni nub phyogs te gza' zla
T02D2624:200b-13: ba phyag na ku mu ta thogs pa dang ngang
T02D2624:200b-15: g-yas ni lho phyogs te phur bu sku mdog sngon po phyag na bu sti bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:200b-16: g-yon du gza' lhag bri bar bya //
T02D2624:200b-17: zhes pa ni g-yon ni byang phyogs te gza' lhag padma la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:200b-18: phyag g-yas mchod spyin byed pa /
T02D2624:200b-20: me yi phyogs su mig dmar dang //
T02D2624:200b-21: zhes pa ni shar lho'i mtshams te /
T02D2624:200b-22: mig dmar mdog dmar po phyag g-yas pa na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa /
T02D2624:200b-23: g-yon pa na me sgron bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:200b-24: rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste //
T02D2624:200b-25: zhes pa ni rlung ni nub byang gi mtshams te
T02D2624:200b-26: gza' nyi ma rta la zhon ba phyag g-yas pa
T02D2624:200b-27: na padma kha bye ba bsnams pa /
T02D2624:200b-28: g-yon ba na mtha' ber bsnams pa bri /
T02D2624:200b-29: dbang ldan phyogs su sben pa'o //
T02D2624:200b-30: zhes pa ni dbang ldan ni byang shar gyi phyogs te /
T02D2624:200b-31: spen pa lag pa g-yas na dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02D2624:200b-32: g-yon pa dgra sta thogs pa /
T02D2624:200b-33: stan nang tshangs can la 'dug pa bri /
T02D2624:200b-34: srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri //
T02D2624:200b-36: srin po ni lho nub kyi phyogs su sgra gcan
T02D2624:200b-37: mdog dud kha mi'i mgo can ro smad sprul du
T02D2624:200b-38: 'dug ba ; phyag g-yas pa na padma sdong bu dang bcas pa /
T02D2624:200b-39: g-yon pa na ral gri bsnams pa bri /
T02D2624:200b-40: da ni 'khor rgyu skar smos te /
T02D2624:200b-41: dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu //
T02D2624:200b-42: zhes pa ni phyi rol gru chad phyi snam la
T02D2624:200b-43: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyang rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2624:200b-44: nas 'byung ba bzhin du bri ba ni phyogs rer
T02D2624:200b-45: bdun bdun no // smin drug dmar po bum pa la gnas pa /
T02D2624:200b-46: snar ma ljang gu khyu ba dkar po la zhon pa /
T02D2624:200b-47: mgo ser po sha ba la zhon pa /
T02D2624:200b-48: lag dmar po sprul la zhon pa /
T02D2624:200b-49: nab so ser po padma la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:200b-50: rgyal ljang gu bum pa la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:200b-51: skag ljang gu bya rog la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-0: mchu ser po me tog la @201a * //
T02D2624:201a-2: gre dkar po padma la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-3: dbo ljang gu chu srin la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-4: me bzhi ser po glang po che la zhon pa /
T02D2624:201a-5: nag pa ljang su rma bya la zhon pa /
T02D2624:201a-6: sa ri dmar po lcong mo la zhon pa /
T02D2624:201a-7: sag ljang gu rta dkar bo la zhon pa /
T02D2624:201a-8: lha mtshams ser po bya rog la zhon pa /
T02D2624:201a-9: sgrog dmar po nang tshangs can la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-10: snubs ljang gu sbal pa la zhon pa /
T02D2624:201a-11: chu stod ser po nang tshangs can la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-12: chu smad ljang gu mi'i snying la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-13: byi bzhin dkar po nang tshangs can la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-14: gro bzhin ser po skur ma la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-15: mon grub dmar po nang tshangs can la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-16: mon gre ljang gu glud khyu mchog zhon pa /
T02D2624:201a-17: chu stod ljang gu gser khri la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-18: tha skar ljang gu mi la 'dug pa /
T02D2624:201a-19: bra nye ser po 'khor lo la 'dug pa'o //
T02D2624:201a-20: sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams //
T02D2624:201a-21: khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya //
T02D2624:201a-23: phyi rol gyi sgo bzhi la rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D2624:201a-24: ma la sogs pa bzhi rab tu khros pa bskal
T02D2624:201a-25: pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil na rdo rje'i brag
T02D2624:201a-26: ri la brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa bri
T02D2624:201a-27: / rdo rje 'dzin mar zhugs nas ni //
T02D2624:201a-28: zhes pa nas sam ya h'um gi bar gyis ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ba stan to //
T02D2624:201a-29: da ni dbang bskur ba ston te /
T02D2624:201a-30: de nas gza' brgyang sngags btab ste ;
T02D2624:201a-31: / de bum brgyang kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2624:201a-32: zhes pa ni bdag nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la /
T02D2624:201a-33: bum pa brgyang gza' brgyang kyi sngags kyis btab nas
T02D2624:201a-34: slob ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcas nas bsgrub par
T02D2624:201a-35: bya'o // de nas tsandan dmar po'i shing la 'bras thug rin po che dang ;
T02D2624:201a-42: kla rtsi gur gum rnams bsres la gza' brgyang bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2624:201a-43: da ni gza' brgyang kyis dam bcas ba ston te /
T02D2624:201a-44: de nas gza' chen po de dag ni zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bsrung zhing /
T02D2624:201a-45: rang gis dam bcas pa thams cad mi nyams bar bya ba'i phyir smos so //
T02D2624:201a-46: de nas rgyu skar dang yud tsam gyis ni zhes
T02D2624:201a-47: pa ni rgyu skar rnams yud tsam gyis ni mkha'
T02D2624:201a-48: la 'gro ste / de yang yud tsam gyi tshad
T02D2624:201a-49: las ni zhag tsam du brtsi zhing zhag la rgyu
T02D2624:201a-50: skar gyi rlung ded pa'i phyir smos so //
T02D2624:201b-1: dus dang zla tshigs dang zhes pa ni yud tsam gyi tshad las skad cig brtsi ste /
T02D2624:201b-2: yud tsam ni bud med bal 'khal ba skyen bul
T02D2624:201b-3: ran pas mo rang gi lag pa gang nar gyis
T02D2624:201b-4: drangs nas bkal te 'phang la bgos pa'i tshad ni
T02D2624:201b-5: yud tsam mo // yud tsam nyi shu ni skad cag go //
T02D2624:201b-6: skad cig nyi shu ni thang gcig go //
T02D2624:201b-7: thang gcig bcu drug ni nyin zhag gcig go //
T02D2624:201b-8: nyin zhag gcig la gza' dang rgyu skar rim par
T02D2624:201b-9: rgyu ba de'i nyin par de bsgrubs na 'grub par
T02D2624:201b-10: gsungs so // dus dang lo tshigs dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:201b-11: dus nam zla dbyar dgun ston dpyid bzhi'o //
T02D2624:201b-12: de yang lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis la de yang rab 'bri nag gsum gsum du dbye'o //
T02D2624:201b-13: de re re la yang gza' dang rgyu skar gang rgyu bde shes par bya ba'i phyir smos so //
T02D2624:201b-14: sbyor ba dang khyim dang dus sbyor dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:201b-15: sbyor ba ni skar ma dang gza' sbyor ba'o //
T02D2624:201b-16: dus tshod dang tshes grangs su sbyor ba dang /
T02D2624:201b-17: nam zla re re la rgyu skar re re la rgyug rim du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2624:201b-18: khyim ni gnas te rgyu skar rim par rgyu ba'i gnas te /
T02D2624:201b-19: de'i dus yu yang rang gi khyim du yang rgyu
T02D2624:201b-20: rnams rim pas bsgrub cing gnas par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2624:201b-21: dus ni nam zla dus bzhi'am /
T02D2624:201b-22: zhag gi grangs kyi dus su rgyu skar bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2624:201b-23: 'jug phod la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang du 'jug pa de smos so //
T02D2624:201b-24: phyi ma ni bde ste ma smos so //
T02D2624:201b-25: gza' brgyang kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bsdus pa bshad zin to //
T02D2624:201b-26: da ni klu chen po brgyang kyi dkyil 'khor bshad de /
T02D2624:201b-27: de ni 'jig rten pa'i sems can klu gdon gyis
T02D2624:201b-28: zin pa rnams thar par bya ba'i phyir smos so
T02D2624:201b-30: de nas klu chen po brgyang kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras ni zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:201b-31: de nas ni skabs kyi de ma thag pa ste gza' brgyang kyi rting thogs su 'byung ba'o //
T02D2624:201b-32: klu chen po brgyud ni mtha' yas dang rigs ldan gnyis bram ze'i rigs me las byung ba ste /
T02D2624:201b-33: dkar po nor rgyas dang dung skyong gnyis rgyal rigs las byung ba ste mdog kyang ser /
T02D2624:201b-34: 'jog po dang padma chen po gnyis rlung las byung bas rje'u'i rigs te mdog kyang dmar /
T02D2624:201b-35: stobs kyi rgyud dang padma gnyis chu las byung ba ste /
T02D2624:201b-36: dmangs rigs mdog nag po ni rigs bzhi'i gtso bo bzhi yin pas chen po'o //
T02D2624:202a-1: ces bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig sgyu med pa'i snying po ste /
T02D2624:202a-3: dper na nor gyi dam pa ni phud du bcad de bzhag pa dang /
T02D2624:202a-4: zas kyi dam pa ni phud snal bcad de gzhag ba lha mchod pa dang 'dra bar /
T02D2624:202a-5: bdag gi dam tshig sgyu med pa'i rtags yin par
T02D2624:202a-6: shes par bya ste rnam ba gcig tu phud ni
T02D2624:202a-7: mang po las nyung du na gcod pa dang 'dra
T02D2624:202a-8: bar klu'i snying po mang po zhig byung yang /
T02D2624:202a-9: nyung du ba stan na phud ces bya ba las med pas na phud ni bsdus pa dang /
T02D2624:202a-10: 'dus pa'i phyir na sgras mnyam pa'i thabs su brjod do //
T02D2624:202a-11: bcom ldan 'das la snying bo dbul bar zhub gsol ba dang /
T02D2624:202a-12: klu'i rgyal po la ngang ba dang /
T02D2624:202a-13: klu'i rgyal po dga' nas snying po brjod pa ni rab tu bde ste ma smos so //
T02D2624:202a-14: da ni klu chen po brgyang kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don ston te /
T02D2624:202a-15: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2624:202a-16: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes smos so //
T02D2624:202a-17: da nas ni skabs kyi rting thogs so //
T02D2624:202a-18: de dag ni glu chen po de dag go //
T02D2624:202a-19: dkyil ni phyag na rdo rje klu'i rgyal po'i tshul du gnas so //
T02D2624:202a-20: 'khor ni klu chen po brgyang do //
T02D2624:202a-21: bshad pa ni de'i don dang tshig ba stan pa'o //
T02D2624:202a-22: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2624:202a-24: kha dog dkar po bri bar bya //
T02D2624:202a-26: padma ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa'i dbus su
T02D2624:202a-27: padma 'dab ma brgyang pa kha dog dkar por bris
T02D2624:202a-28: te / dkyil 'khor sum gnyis las gcad par bya'o //
T02D2624:202a-30: shing rta'i snam bu la bang mig dang sgo dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2624:202a-31: dbus su phyag na rdo rje sprul mgo mtha' yas
T02D2624:202a-32: pa'i gdengs ka can klu'i rgyal po bsdigs pa'i tshul
T02D2624:202a-34: padma'i 'dab ma la shar phyogs su mtha' yas phyag na autpala bsnams pa /
T02D2624:202a-36: nub tu stobs kyi rgyu sprul gyi gshol /
T02D2624:202a-37: byang phyogs su dung skyong dung phor /
T02D2624:202a-38: shar lhor nor rgyas bum pa /
T02D2624:202a-39: lho nub tu padma padma 'dab ma brgyang /
T02D2624:202a-40: nub byad du chu lha sprul zhags /
T02D2624:202a-41: byang shar du rigs ldan rin chen rgyal bu rnams /
T02D2624:202a-42: bru chad la dus bzhi'i lha mo /
T02D2624:202a-43: shing rta'i bang mig la klu gnod sgor sgo ba rnams bri'o //
T02D2624:202a-44: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i thabs bsdus pa bshad zin to //
T02D2624:202a-45: mchod rdzas bde ste ma smos so //
T02D2624:202b-0: @202b da ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ston te /
T02D2624:202b-2: de nas rdo rje bdag nyid zhugs pa ni zhes pa ni /
T02D2624:202b-3: de nas ni skabs kyi rting thogs so //
T02D2624:202b-4: rdo rje ni slob dpon sku gsung thugs rdo rjer bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:202b-5: bdag nyid ni dkyil 'khor bdag nyid du gnas shing bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:202b-6: zhugs pa ni gnyis su med par bya ba'i don to //
T02D2624:202b-8: sprul mgos sprul mgo can rnams dgug / phud ces bya ba'i lhan cig tu /
T02D2624:202b-9: dza; h'um bam ho:zhes brjod cing //
T02D2624:202b-11: sprul mgos ni zhes pa ni bdag slob dpon las kyi bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:202b-12: sprul mgo can rnams ni klu rnam pa brgyang la sogs pa'o //
T02D2624:202b-13: dgug pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gnyis su med par byas pa'o //
T02D2624:202b-14: phud ni dam tshig gi mna'i snying po'o //
T02D2624:202b-15: lhan cig tu ni dam las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:202b-18: bam ni lcags sgrog / ho:ni dril bu phyag rgya
T02D2624:202b-19: rnam ba bzhis bkug nas dam tshig dang ldan par
T02D2624:202b-20: byed pa'o // da ni slob ma gzhug cing dbang bskur ba ston te /
T02D2624:202b-21: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2624:202b-22: de nas bu ni rgyal po dang //
T02D2624:202b-23: rgyal rigs thams cad bcug nas ni //
T02D2624:202b-25: de nas ni skabs kyi rting thogs so //
T02D2624:202b-27: rgyal po ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o: / rgyal rigs thams cad dkyil 'khor du gzhug go //
T02D2624:202b-29: dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2624:202b-30: phud ces bya ba'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D2624:202b-31: zhes pa ni dug ni klus zin nas sdug bsngal gyi nad do //
T02D2624:202b-32: nyes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skyon gyis
T02D2624:202b-33: klu dang 'gras pa na bkra mi shis shing mi
T02D2624:202b-34: la skyon yod pa bsal ba'i phyir smos so //
T02D2624:202b-35: phud ni dam tshig snying po la dbang bskur ba ni slob ma ste /
T02D2624:202b-36: klu dang gnyis su med par bya zhing mi gnod par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur ro //
T02D2624:202b-37: de ltar byas na klu thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2624:202b-38: klu bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub bo //
T02D2624:202b-39: klu ma mgu nas smon lam 'de bas pa dang /
T02D2624:202b-40: rang gi dam tshig gi mna' bor ba dang /
T02D2624:202b-41: dus rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang /
T02D2624:202b-42: rgyal ba'i bka' srung ba ni bde ste ma smos so //
T02D2624:202b-43: da ni klu bsgrubs nas nad zhi bar byed pa'i thabs ston te /
T02D2624:203a-2: de nas sgrub pa bshad de /
T02D2624:203a-3: lha rdzas 'od phreng dkar po yi //
T02D2624:203a-4: dbu la sprul mgo bzhis bskor ba'i //
T02D2624:203a-6: de ni gong gi mjug sdud la nas ni 'og gi mgo 'dren pa'o //
T02D2624:203a-7: bsgrub pa ni dug gi de kho na nyid kyis /
T02D2624:203a-8: klu'i skyon bsal cing nad zhi bar byed pas bsgrub pa /
T02D2624:203a-9: lha rdzas ni bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsgoms
T02D2624:203a-10: pa'i dbu la lha rdzas kyi 'od phreng dkar bo'i
T02D2624:203a-11: dbu rgyan sbrul mgo bzhin du bsgoms te /
T02D2624:203a-13: rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams nas kyang //
T02D2624:203a-14: phud ces bya ba 'bum bzlas la //

T02D2624:209b-35: sku mdog dkar po phyag na padma bsnams pa bri
T02D2624:209b-36: / byang gi phyogs na rgya gram bsnams //
T02D2624:209b-37: zhes pa ni byang phyogs rdo rje las rab sku
T02D2624:209b-38: mdog ljang gu phyag na rgya gram bsnams pa bri
T02D2624:209b-39: / phyi rol du ni kun bskor zhing //
T02D2624:210a-1: rol ni 'khor lo rdo rje ra bas zlum por
T02D2624:210a-2: bskor ba'i phyi rol gru chad la ni rdo rje
T02D2624:210a-3: l'a skye sku mdog dkar mo phyag khu tshur gyis
T02D2624:210a-4: dkur rten pa'o // lhor m'a le sku mdog sngon
T02D2624:210a-5: mo phyag na rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o
T02D2624:210a-6: dkur rten pa'o // // nub tu dbyangs mkhan sku mdog dmar mo phyag na pi wang bsnams pa /
T02D2624:210a-7: byang du gar mkhan ma ljang gu gar mdzad pa /
T02D2624:210a-8: shar du bdug pa ma sku mdog dkar mo phyag na bdug spos bsnams pa /
T02D2624:210a-9: lhor me tog ma sku mdog sngon mo phyag na me tog gi gzhong bu bsnams pa /
T02D2624:210a-10: nub tu mar me ma sku mdog dmar mo phyag na mar me bsnams pa /
T02D2624:210a-11: byang du dri chab ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag
T02D2624:210a-12: na dung por bsnams pa ste de rnams ni grv'a
T02D2624:210a-13: nas rim par bskor zhing bri ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2624:210a-14: // sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par bya //
T02D2624:210a-15: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas ni 'das pa dang da
T02D2624:210a-16: ltar gnyis pas thams cad gzhag par bya ba ni
T02D2624:210a-17: gru chad kyi phyi rol du snam bu gcig byas
T02D2624:210a-18: pa la bri bar bya ba ste /
T02D2624:210a-19: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bdun bri bar bya ste mar me mdzad dang /
T02D2624:210a-25: sh'akya thub pa de'i 'khor du btang ba dang bdun no //
T02D2624:210a-26: de ni sprul ba'i sku cha lugs dbu re ga dang zhabs rjen du bri /
T02D2624:210a-27: phyag mtshan mi dgos pas shar nas rim par bskor ba bri /
T02D2624:210a-28: de'i bar du da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ste /
T02D2624:210a-29: de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs su bzhugs
T02D2624:210a-30: pas phyag mtshan yang bri ste rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2624:210a-31: sku mdog ser po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o
T02D2624:210a-32: // mi bskyod pa sku mdog dkar po phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210a-33: rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog sngon po phyag na rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210a-34: snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po phyag na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210a-35: don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu phyag na rgya gram bsnams pa bri'o //
T02D2624:210a-36: de'i phyi rol du sgo gdod la shar na lcags kyu dkar po lcags kyu bsnams pa bri /
T02D2624:210b-0: zhags ba sngon po zhags pa bsnams pa @210b lhor bri /
T02D2624:210b-1: lcags sgrog dmar po lcags sgrog bsnams pa nub tu bri /
T02D2624:210b-2: dril bu ljang gu dril bu bsnams pa byang du bri /
T02D2624:210b-3: da ni sems dpa' bcu drug bri thabs ston te de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2624:210b-4: de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2624:210b-5: go rims bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02D2624:210b-7: sems dpa' ni rigs so so la sprul pa ste bcu drug go //
T02D2624:210b-8: bshad pa ni kun rig nas 'byung ba dang mthun /
T02D2624:210b-9: shar phyogs rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-10: rdo rje rgyal po ser po lcags kyu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-11: rdo rje chags pa dmar po mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-12: rdo rje legs pa ljang gu se gol bsnams pa shar phyogs su rim pas bri'o /
T02D2624:210b-13: lho phyogs su rdo rje rin chen sku mdog sngon po rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-14: rdo rje gzi brjid dmar ser nyi ma bsnams ba'o //
T02D2624:210b-15: rdo rje rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i mdog rgyal mtshan bsnams pa /
T02D2624:210b-16: rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po so'i phreng ba bsnams pa /
T02D2624:210b-17: nub tu rdo rje chos rab sku mdog dmar po phyag na padma bsnams pa bri /
T02D2624:210b-18: rdo rje rnon po sngon po ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-19: rdo rje 'khor lo ser po 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-20: rdo rje smra ba dmar po ljags bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-21: byang phyogs su rdo rje las rab sku mdog ljang gu rgya gram bsnams pa bri'o //
T02D2624:210b-22: rdo rje srung ba ser po go cha bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-23: rdo rje gnod spyin nag po mche ba bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-24: rdo rje khu tshur ser po khu tshur bsnams pa bri'o //
T02D2624:210b-25: da ni dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bri ba smos te /
T02D2624:210b-26: de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2624:210b-27: zhes bya ste de ni sems dpa' bcu drug gi phyi rol gyi snam bu la'o //
T02D2624:210b-29: dpa' ba ni ye shes te mtshan ma la dpa' bas na dpe med pa rnams smros so //
T02D2624:210b-30: shar phyogs su thugs mchog dpe med pa bzhi ste nyon mongs mun sel dang /
T02D2624:210b-32: 'khor ba rgyun gcod rnams rdo rje lcags kyu sha dag pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:210b-33: srid pa'i mtsho sgrol phyag na 'khor lo bsnams so //
T02D2624:211a-2: rin chen mdzod sku mdog sngon po rin chen 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-3: dge ba'i blo gros pu sti bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-4: bde ba'i 'byung gnas rin po che'i sgrom bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-5: legs pa'i tog rin po che'i mchod sdong 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-6: nub tu gsung mchog dpe med pa bzhi bri ste
T02D2624:211a-7: don mthun yid 'ong sku mdog sngon po phyag na
T02D2624:211a-8: dgu po rgyud mangs bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-9: bde ba'i 'byung gnas rin po che'i phreng bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-10: the tshom yid myur padma'i sdong bu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-11: nga ro snyan ba dung bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-12: byang phyogs su phrin las dpe med pa bzhi ste
T02D2624:211a-13: tshad med yon tan sku mdog ljang gu dpag bsam
T02D2624:211a-15: dran pa'i stobs mchog zla tshes bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-16: thams cad kun sgrol lcags kyu /
T02D2624:211a-17: brtson 'grus mi ldog autpala bsnams pa bri'o //
T02D2624:211a-18: da ni skal bzang bcu drug dpe med pa dang spel mar bri ba 'byung ste /
T02D2624:211a-19: byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri //
T02D2624:211a-21: byams pa sa bcu'i rgyal tshab yin pas sna la smos so //
T02D2624:211a-22: sogs kyi khongs su ni sems dpa' bcu drug bsdu'o //
T02D2624:211a-23: shar phyogs su dpa' bar 'gro ba ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-24: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po rin po che'i snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-25: zla 'od gzhon nu zla ba tshes pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-26: bzang skyong rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-27: lho phyogs su dra ba can gyi 'od rin po che'i dra ba bsnams pa bri'o //
T02D2624:211a-28: nam mkha'i mdzod rin po che'i mdzod bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-29: rdo rje snying po rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-30: 'ong dpag med pa rin po che 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-31: nub phyogs su ye shes tog rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-32: mya ngan kun 'joms ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-33: blo gros mi zad pa pu sti bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-34: spobs pa brtsegs pa rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-35: byang phyogs su byams pa klu shing gundhe bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-36: spos kyi glang po dung phor bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211a-37: ngan song kun 'dren lcags kyu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-0: don @211b yod grub ba rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa bri'o //
T02D2624:211b-1: der sgo byas la khro bo brgyang bri ste /
T02D2624:211b-2: mchog chen bzhi ni bri bar bya //
T02D2624:211b-3: zhes smos pas sko srung yang de brgyang bri ste /
T02D2624:211b-4: sgo srung de rnams ni phyi nang gi bgegs 'dul bas mchog go //
T02D2624:211b-5: gzhan yang khyad par du 'phags bas spyan che zhes pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-6: bri ba ni shar du 'jig rten gsum snang sku mdog dkar po phyag na nyi ma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-7: 'jig rten gsum 'dul phyag na rtse gsum 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-8: 'jig rten gsum 'jigs sku mdog sngon po phyag na thod dbyug bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-9: 'jig rten gsum mthar byed phyag na be con bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-10: nub tu bdud rtsi thab sbyor sku mdog dmar skya phyag na rgya gram bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-11: be con nag po dgra sta bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-12: byang du mi g-yo mgon po sku mdog ljang gu dbyug pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-13: rta mgrin padma bsnams pa sgo g-yas g-yon du zung re bri'o //
T02D2624:211b-14: de'i phyi rim gyi snam bu la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas spel mar bri ste /
T02D2624:211b-15: de ltar dge slong kun dga' sogs //
T02D2624:211b-16: thub rnams de yi phyi rol bri //
T02D2624:211b-18: kun dga' bo ni zhabs 'bri nag yin pas sna la smos te bsil yab bsnams so //
T02D2624:211b-19: sh'a ri'i bu rin po che /
T02D2624:211b-24: katy'a yan rin po che'i sgrom /
T02D2624:211b-31: nor spyin 'dzin rin po che'i rkyal bu /
T02D2624:211b-33: 'od srungs rin chen 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:211b-34: thub pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas te /
T02D2624:211b-36: dam tshig dang sdom pa slob dpon med kyang rang gis thub pas na thub pa rnams so //
T02D2624:211b-37: rang sangs rgyas 'jigs byed rdo rje /
T02D2624:211b-38: snang brtsegs rin po che'i mdzod /
T02D2624:211b-40: nyon mongs gdung sel bsil yab /
T02D2624:211b-41: shes rab mgyogs chen zla tshes /
T02D2624:212a-2: bse ru lta bu bsam gtan phyag rgya 'cha'/
T02D2624:212a-3: ri bo'i rgyal po rin po che'i snyem /
T02D2624:212a-4: seng ge lta bu'i rdo rje /
T02D2624:212a-5: yid myur bsil yab bsnams pa bri'o //
T02D2624:212a-6: de ltar lha brgya rtsa bdun 'jig rten las 'das pa la yod do //
T02D2624:212a-7: sgo ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi ste /
T02D2624:212a-9: de'i phyi rol gyi snam bu la /
T02D2624:212a-11: tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri //
T02D2624:212a-13: phyi rol gyi snam bu la bri ste /
T02D2624:212a-15: btsun mo tshangs ma pi wang thogs pa'o //
T02D2624:212a-16: mdag gzhug yid du 'ong ba'i ral gri /
T02D2624:212a-17: pho nya mdag pa ste padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:212a-20: pho nya rnam par snang ba mda' gzhu /
T02D2624:212a-21: mdag gzhug ded dpon nag po mdung thung bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:212a-22: brgya byin rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams pa /
T02D2624:212a-24: mdag gzhug yid du 'ong ba ral gri /
T02D2624:212a-25: pho nya myur ba'i shugs can rtse gsum bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:212a-27: btsun mo dpal ldan mo gsal shing /
T02D2624:212a-28: mngag gzhug rdo rje bde ba mche ba bsnams /
T02D2624:212a-29: pho nya rdo rje sde dpon 'khor lo bsnams pa bri ste /
T02D2624:212a-30: de ltar bcu drug ste brgya nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
T02D2624:212a-31: de'i phyi rim gyi snam bu la bri ba'i lha ston te /
T02D2624:212a-32: gza' dang skar ma'i lha rnams dang //
T02D2624:212a-35: pa ba sangs me tog / phur bu pu sti /
T02D2624:212a-39: mig dmar bdud rtsi'i bum pa /
T02D2624:212a-50: de rnams shar phyogs su bri'o //
T02D2624:212a-51: phyag mtshan ni rin po che'i snyan cha dang /
T02D2624:212a-52: gdu bu she dag bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:212a-59: sa ga rnams ni rin po che'i me tog bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:212a-60: nub phyogs su lha mtshams dang /
T02D2624:212b-1: gro bzhin rnams ni padma'i sdong bu she ngag bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:212b-2: byang phyogs su mon dre dang /
T02D2624:212b-8: bra nye rnams ni autpala she dag bsnams pa'o //
T02D2624:212b-9: da ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams ston te /
T02D2624:212b-10: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams ni //
T02D2624:212b-12: shar du yul 'khor srung pi wang /
T02D2624:212b-14: nub tu mig mi bzang sprul zhags /
T02D2624:212b-15: byang du rnam thos sras ba dan bsnams pa ste /
T02D2624:212b-16: de ltar na 'jig rten pa'i lha bzhi bcu ste /
T02D2624:212b-17: brgya drug cu rtsa gsum mo ;
T02D2624:212b-18: / da ni de'i phyi rol gyi snam bu ston te /
T02D2624:212b-19: phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams //
T02D2624:212b-20: zhes pa ni phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyang na /
T02D2624:212b-21: 'jig rten skyong bas phyogs skyong ngo //
T02D2624:212b-23: gshin rje thod dbyug / chu lha sprul zhags /
T02D2624:212b-32: zla ba ku mu ta ste /
T02D2624:212b-33: de ltar na brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D2624:212b-34: de ni gza' dang rgyu skar gyi snam bu dang bsre'o //
T02D2624:212b-35: da ni phyi rol gyi snam bu'i ngan song gsum gyi don ston te /
T02D2624:212b-36: de yi phyi rol dmyal ba kun //
T02D2624:212b-38: dmyal ba yang mdor bsdu na tsha grang gnyis /
T02D2624:212b-39: nyi tshe ba dang kha 'khor ba dang gsum mo //
T02D2624:212b-40: tsha ba'i brgyang ni yang sos dang /
T02D2624:212b-47: mnar med pa dang brgyang do //
T02D2624:212b-56: padma ltar gas pa chen po ste brgyang do //
T02D2624:212b-58: kha 'khor gnyis te bco brgyang do //
T02D2624:212b-59: ming ngam brda'am thig ler bris te gzhag /'dod chags la sogs byol song 'dra //
T02D2624:212b-60: zhes pa ni 'dod chags phug ron dang /
T02D2624:213a-1: pa la sogs pa bri ste /
T02D2624:213a-2: de ltar nyi shu rtsa gnyis te /
T02D2624:213a-3: spyir brgya dgu bcu rtsa bdun yod do //
T02D2624:213a-4: sgo sgor gsungs pa de bzhin du //
T02D2624:213a-5: zhes pa ni gong du sgo bzhi rim du gsungs ba de rnams la bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:213a-6: mchod pa'i bye brag ni bde ste ma smos so //
T02D2624:213a-7: da ni sngags mkhan dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i don ston te /
T02D2624:213a-8: de nas sngags mkhan nyid kyis ni //
T02D2624:213a-9: spyan drangs bdag nyid 'jug par bya //
T02D2624:213a-11: de nas ni gong gi rting thogs so //
T02D2624:213a-12: sngags mkhan ni slob dpon te /
T02D2624:213a-16: thabs kyi bye brag la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2624:213a-17: spyan drangs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs nas gzugs brnyan la phab ste /
T02D2624:213a-18: bdag nyid kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2624:213a-19: bdag nyid kyis ni dbang bskur la //
T02D2624:213a-21: bdag nyid ni slob dpon no ;
T02D2624:213a-22: / dbang bskur ni slob ma de'i 'og tu dbang bskur ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2624:213a-23: da ni slob dpon de'i yon tan ston te /
T02D2624:213a-24: sdom gnas dam tshig ldan pa dang //
T02D2624:213a-26: sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'o //
T02D2624:213a-27: dam tshig ni yo ga'i dam tshig lnga'o //
T02D2624:213a-28: bla ma mos shing mi 'jigs pa //
T02D2624:213a-30: bla ma ni rdo rje slob dpon te /
T02D2624:213a-31: mos pa ni slob ma'i sems so //
T02D2624:213a-32: mi 'jigs pa ni slob ma mi shes pas mi 'jigs pa'o //
T02D2624:213a-33: rigs bskyed skyon dang bral ba dang //
T02D2624:213a-35: yo ga'i rigs bzhi dang lha lnga'o //
T02D2624:213a-36: bskyed pa ni sems bskyed pa'o //
T02D2624:213a-37: skyon ni sdig pa'i sems so //
T02D2624:213a-39: ser sna ma lus spangs 'gyur zhing //
T02D2624:213a-41: ser sna ni sna la yeng yeng /
T02D2624:213a-43: spangs 'gyur ni nor lam chags pa'o //
T02D2624:213a-44: yon tan mang po ldan 'gyur zhing //
T02D2624:213a-49: yi rang zhing gtong phod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2624:213a-50: gtong dang tshul khrims mang du thos pa dang //
T02D2624:213a-52: gtong ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2624:213b-0: yongs su gtong ba ni rgyal srid gtong @213b ba dang /
T02D2624:213b-1: gtong ba chen po ni lus la sogs pa gtod ba'o //
T02D2624:213b-2: tshul ni theg pa chen po'i chos kyi tshul lo //
T02D2624:213b-3: khrims ni de'i don nyams su len pa'o //
T02D2624:213b-4: mang du thos pa ni sde snod gsum gyi don
T02D2624:213b-5: la yid ches pa'i dad pas gzhan la nyan cing
T02D2624:213b-6: thos pa'o // byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems //
T02D2624:213b-8: byams pa ni phyogs med pa'o //
T02D2624:213b-9: snying rje ni mi bzod cing gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o //
T02D2624:213b-10: dga' dang btang snyoms gnas pa dang //
T02D2624:213b-12: dga' ba ni chos bzhin can no //
T02D2624:213b-13: btang snyoms ni gang la yang mi gnas shing ma chags par gnas pa'o //
T02D2624:213b-14: stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sems //
T02D2624:213b-16: stong pa ni rnam par thar pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ngang /
T02D2624:213b-17: thugs mtshan ma med pa'i sems su gnas pa'o //
T02D2624:213b-18: smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa //
T02D2624:213b-20: smon pa med pa ni gsum /
T02D2624:213b-21: smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa las /
T02D2624:213b-22: yid dang ldan pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas /
T02D2624:213b-23: rnam par thar pa gsum dang ldan pa'i don bsgom pa'o //
T02D2624:213b-24: da ni slob ma gzud cing me tog dor nas /
T02D2624:213b-25: dam tshig dbog pa'i tshig ston te /
T02D2624:213b-26: de nas slob ma sngags 'di yis //
T02D2624:213b-27: zhes pa ni slob ma 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'dis slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2624:213b-28: phyi ma bde ste brda phrad sla'o //
T02D2624:213b-29: de nas phyag na rdo rjes so //

T02D2624:214b-21: bdag gi snying gar 'khor lo cig bsams la /
T02D2624:214b-22: 'khor lo'i lte bar rdo rje rgya gram cig bsams te /
T02D2624:214b-23: rgya gram gyi bsnol mtshams su h'um bsgoms nas /

T02D2624:215a-2: sreg pa ni dngos po dang mtshan ma rnams sreg pa'o //
T02D2624:215a-3: cho ga ni las kyi bye brag la mkhas par bya ba yin zhes so //
T02D2624:215a-4: rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgyur la /
T02D2624:215a-5: zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya zhing //
T02D2624:215a-7: bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgoms la /
T02D2624:215a-8: gos dang kha dog dkar por byas te /
T02D2624:215a-9: kha shar phyogs su bltas nas las byas na /

T02D2624:215a-18: bdag rin chen 'byung ldan mdog gser 'od ltar mdzes shing 'od 'bar bar bsgoms nas /
T02D2624:215a-19: nyi ma'i gung la rgyas pa'i las byas na /

T02D2624:215a-21: nas byin gyis brlabs na 'byor pa dang ldan par

T02D2624:215a-23: 'byor dang ldan pas khung bur ni //

T02D2624:215a-37: rdo rje rin chen rgyas pa ste //
T02D2624:215a-38: dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin no //

T02D2624:215b-0: dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin @215b no ;

T02D2624:215b-3: longs spyod dbang phyug dpal mnyam med //

T02D2624:215b-5: tog ni gzung 'dzin rnam pa gnyis las rgyal ba de bzhin du /
T02D2624:215b-6: bdag gis phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i las las byas la /
T02D2624:215b-8: khams gsum gyi dbang phyug dang /

T02D2624:215b-19: rdo rje bzhad par bsgoms nas de'i phrin las byas na /

T02D2624:215b-23: blo rangs pa'i bsam par 'gyur ro //

T02D2624:216a-20: 'phro bar bsgom zhing gang nad kyis zin pa de

T02D2624:216b-0: snying gar spros na @216b 'dod pa kun dbang du 'gyur ro //

T02D2624:216b-14: te zhes pa ni rdo rje ni ye shes te

T02D2624:216b-40: shar lhor 'jig rten gsum 'dul thod dbyug bsnams pa /
T02D2624:216b-41: lhor 'jig rten gsum 'jig rdo rje rtse gsum /

T02D2624:217a-1: 'jig bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rgya gram /

T02D2624:217a-4: byang shar rta mgrin padma bsnams pa'o //

T02D2624:217a-7: nub kyi rtsibs la mtshan mo nag mo zla ba bsnams /

T02D2624:217a-9: lha rdzas 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs //
